THE ORIGINAL AND THE REISSUED TICKET MUST BE ANNOTATED - BAG. BUSINESS 32KG/158CM - AND - BAG. ECONOMY 23KG/158CM- AND - HAVE A NICE TRIP - IN THE ENDORSEMENT BOX.
rules_penalties:
PE.PENALTIES FROM/TO EUROPE FOR LRIESO TYPE FARES 
CANCELLATIONS 
ANY TIME CHARGE EUR 100.00 FOR CANCEL/REFUND. WAIVED FOR DEATH OF PASSENGER OR FAMILY MEMBER. CHARGE EUR 125.00 FOR NO-SHOW. WAIVED FOR DEATH OF PASSENGER OR FAMILY MEMBER. NOTE - CHILD DISCOUNT DOES NOT APPLY INFANT NOT OCCUPYING A SEAT FREE OF CHARGE ----- MOST RESTRICTIVE CONDITIONS APPLY WITHIN A PRICING UNIT WITH FOLLOWING EXCEPTION WHEN COMBINING A REFUNDABLE FARE WITH A NON- REFUNDABLE FARE 1. THE AMOUNT PAID ON THE REFUNDABLE FARE COMPONENT IS REFUNDED MINUS ANY APPLICABLE PENALTY 2. THE AMOUNT PAID ON THE NON-REFUNDABLE FARE COMPONENT WILL NOT BE REFUNDED BOTH NONREFUNDABLE AMOUNT AND PENALTY SHALL BE ADDED AS REFUND FEES. ----- IN CASE OF REFUND MADE WITHIN 24HOURS BEFORE FLIGHT OR AFTER FLIGHT DEPARTURE REFUND OR NOSHOW CHARGE WILL BE APPLIED WHICHEVER IS HIGHER. ----- FUEL- INSURANCE SURCHARGES ARE REFUNDABLE. SERVICE CHARGE IS NON-REFUNDABLE. ----- REFUND OF UNUSED FEES AND TAXES PERMITTED. UNLESS APPLICABLE OW/RT FARE PLUS TAXES FOR ACTUAL TRAVEL IS HIGHER THAN WHOLE ORIGINAL TICKET. IN THIS CASE NO TAX OR FEE REFUND WILL BE PERMITTED. IN CASE OF NONREFUNDABLE FARES AFTER DEPARTURE NO TAX REFUND. ----- THE NONREFUNDABLE AMOUNT REMAINS NONREFUNDABLE EVEN IF UPGRADED TO A HIGHER FARE. IN THIS CASE REFUND PENALTY WILL EQUAL NONREFUNDABLE AMOUNT PLUS REFUND PENALTY OF THE HIGHER FARE. ----- IN CASE OF TICKET ISSUED USING INCORRECT RBD A CHARGE OF EGP500 WILL BE CHARGED PLUS FARE DIFFERENCE IF ANY ----- TICKET COUPONS MUST BE USED IN SEQUENCE. ANY UNUSED COUPON PRECEDING A USED COUPON CANNOT BE USED/ REISSUED AND MAY ONLY BE REFUNDED. ----- FULL REFUND PERMITTED BEFORE DEPARTURE IN CASE OF REJECTION OF VISA. EMBASSY STATEMENT REQUIRED. EXCEPTION NOT APPLICABLE FOR GROUPS OR HAJJ AND UMRA PASSENGERS. ----- 
CHANGES 
ANY TIME CHARGE EUR 70.00 FOR REISSUE/REVALIDATION. WAIVED FOR DEATH OF PASSENGER OR FAMILY MEMBER. NOTE - CHILD DISCOUNT DOES NOT APPLY INFANT NOT OCCUPYING A SEAT FREE OF CHARGE ----- IN CASE OF REISSUE/ REVALIDATION 24HOURS BEFORE FLIGHT OR AFTER FLIGHT DEPARTURE ONLY NOSHOW FEES TO BE APPLIED. ----- UPGRADE TO HIGHER COMPARTMENT ON SAME FLIGHT/SAME DATE IS PERMITTED WITHOUT A CHARGE ONLY FARE DIFFERENCE TO BE COLLECTED. ----- REISSUE MUST BE COMPLETED 24 HOURS BEFORE FLIGHT DEPARTURE OR WILL BE CHARGED AS NOSHOW. ----- FEE APPLIED PER CHANGED FARE COMPONANT. IF MULTIPLE CHANGES ARE MADE AT THE SAME TIME HIGHEST FEE WILL BE APPLIED OF ALL  CHANGED FARE COMPONANTS. ----- REISSUE RESULTING FARE MUST BE EQUAL OR HIGHER THAN PREVIOUS BASIC FARE. EXCEPTION FROM BUSINESS CLASS TO Y RBD FARES IS PERMITTED. ----- IN CASE OF REISSUE OF UNUSED TICKET APPLY CURRENT FARES. EXCEPTION FOR CHANGE OF ONLY INBOUND FARE COMPONENT APPLY HISTORICAL FARE. BOTH CHANGE FEES AND DIFFERENCE IN FARE TO BE COLLECTED. ----- IN CASE OF REISSUE OF PARTIAL USED TICKETS APPLY HISTORICAL FARES RECALCULATED FROM THE LAST FARE BREAK POINT. ALL CONDITIONS OF THE NEW FARES MUST BE COMPLIED WITH BOTH CHANGE FEES AND DIFFERENCE IN FARE TO BE COLLECTED. ----- INVOLUNTARY CHANGES TO BE EXECUTED FROM EGYPTAIR SALES OFFICES OR CALL CENTER ONLY. TRAVEL AGENTS ARE NOT ALLOWED TO ISSUE INVOLUNTARY TICKETS.

RU.RULE APPLICATION INSTANT PURCHASE NONREFUNDABLE FARES BETWEEN EUROPE AND MIDDLE EAST FOR ONE WAY FARES. APPLICATION AREA THESE FARES APPLY FROM EUROPE TO MIDDLE EAST. CLASS OF SERVICE THESE FARES APPLY FOR ECONOMY CLASS SERVICE. TYPES OF TRANSPORTATION FARES GOVERNED BY THIS RULE CAN BE USED TO CREATE ONE-WAY JOURNEYS. CAPACITY LIMITATIONS THE CARRIER SHALL LIMIT THE NUMBER OF PASSENGERS CARRIED ON ANY ONE FLIGHT AT FARES GOVERNED BY THIS RULE AND SUCH FARES WILL NOT NECESSARILY BE AVAILABLE ON ALL FLIGHTS. THE NUMBER OF SEATS WHICH THE CARRIER SHALL MAKE AVAILABLE ON A GIVEN FLIGHT WILL BE DETERMINED BY THE CARRIERS BEST JUDGMENT BO.BLACKOUTS BETWEEN SPAIN AND CANARY ISLANDS AND DOH 
OUTBOUND - TRAVEL IS NOT PERMITTED 18NOV 22 THROUGH 18DEC 22. SR.SALES RESTRICT 
TICKETS MUST BE ISSUED ON MS . OR - TICKETS MUST BE ISSUED ON MS . OR - TICKETS MUST BE ISSUED ON MS  OR HR. *** GENERAL RULE FOLLOWS *** 
TICKETS MAY NOT BE SOLD IN ERITREA/NIGERIA/COTE D'IVOIRE. TICKETS MAY ONLY BE SOLD IN AREA 1/AREA 2/AREA 3. AP.ADVANCE RES/TKT 
RESERVATIONS ARE REQUIRED FOR ALL SECTORS. NOTE - WARNING IF PASSENGER FAILED TO TRAVEL -NOSHOW- ON A BOOKED SECTOR MS RESERVES THE RIGHT TO CANCEL ALL MS REMAINING SECTORS. FL.FLT APPLICATION 
THE FARE COMPONENT MUST BE ON ONE OR MORE OF THE FOLLOWING ANY MS FLIGHT OPERATED BY MS. CD.CHILD DISCOUNTS 
ACCOMPANIED CHILD 2-11 - CHARGE 75 PERCENT OF THE FARE. TICKET DESIGNATOR - CH. NOTE - AGE 11- MEANS UNTIL ACCOMPANIED CHILD REACHES HIS/HER 12TH BIRTHDAY. OR - UNACCOMPANIED CHILD 2-11 - CHARGE 100 PERCENT OF THE FARE. TICKET DESIGNATOR - UM. NOTE - UM UNDER 2 YEARS WILL NOT BE ACCEPTED FOR CARRIAGE - MINORS BETWEEN 2 AND 5 WILL BE ACCEPTED FOR UNAC COMPANIED TRANSPORTATION EXCEPTIONALLY ONLY AND THIS WILL NECESSITATE ASSIGNMENT OF AN EXTRA HOSTE SS. APPLICABLE ONEWAY MS FARES FOR THE SECTOR ON WHICH EXTRA HOSTESS TRAVELS WITH THE UM WILL B E CHARGED. --- AGE 5 MEANS UNTIL UM REACHES HIS/HER 6TH BIRTHDAY. OR - 1ST INFANT UNDER 2 WITHOUT A SEAT - CHARGE 10 PERCENT OF THE FARE. TICKET DESIGNATOR - IN OR - INFANT UNDER 2 WITH A SEAT - CHARGE 75 PERCENT OF THE FARE. TICKET DESIGNATOR - CH. CO.COMBINABILITY APPLICABLE ADD-ON CONSTRUCTION IS ADDRESSED IN MISCELLANEOUS PROVISIONS - CATEGORY 23. END-ON-END END-ON-END COMBINATIONS PERMITTED WITH DOMESTIC/ INTERNATIONAL FARES. VALIDATE ALL FARE COMPONENTS. FARES MUST BE SHOWN SEPARATELY ON THE TICKET. TRAVEL MUST BE VIA THE POINT OF COMBINATION. SIDE TRIPS PERMITTED. PROVIDED - COMBINATIONS ARE FOR CARRIER MS OPEN JAWS FARES MAY BE COMBINED ON A HALF ROUND TRIP BASIS -TO FORM SINGLE OR DOUBLE OPEN JAWS. A MAXIMUM OF TWO INTERNATIONAL FARE COMPONENTS PERMITTED. MILEAGE OF THE OPEN SEGMENT MUST BE EQUAL/LESS THAN MILEAGE OF THE LONGEST FLOWN FARE COMPONENT. PROVIDED - THE OPEN SEGMENT MUST BE WITHIN -WITHIN AREA 1 OR WITHIN AREA 2 OR WITHIN AREA 3 COMBINATIONS ARE WITH ANY FARE FOR CARRIER MS IN ANY RULE AND TARIFF. ROUND TRIPS/CIRCLE TRIPS FARES MAY BE COMBINED ON A HALF ROUND TRIP BASIS -TO FORM ROUND TRIPS -TO FORM CIRCLE TRIPS A MAXIMUM OF TWO INTERNATIONAL FARE COMPONENTS PERMITTED. PROVIDED - COMBINATIONS ARE WITH ANY FARE FOR CARRIER MS IN ANY RULE AND TARIFF. VR.VOLUNTARY REFUNDS VOLUNTARY CHANGES CONDITIONS MAY APPLY FOR AUTOMATED REFUNDS REFER TO PENALTIES CATEGORY *PE FOR DETAILS

TE.TKT ENDORSEMENT 
IF INFANT UNDER 02 WITHOUT A SEAT. THE ORIGINAL AND THE REISSUED TICKET MUST BE ANNOTATED- 1PC/10KG/115CM - IN THE ENDORSEMENT BOX. 
THE ORIGINAL AND THE REISSUED TICKET MUST BE ANNOTATED - BAG. BUSINESS 32KG/158CM - AND - BAG. ECONOMY 23KG/158CM- AND - HAVE A NICE TRIP - IN THE ENDORSEMENT BOX.
rules_penalties:
PE.PENALTIES FROM/TO EUROPE FOR LRIESO TYPE FARES 
CANCELLATIONS 
ANY TIME CHARGE EUR 100.00 FOR CANCEL/REFUND. WAIVED FOR DEATH OF PASSENGER OR FAMILY MEMBER. CHARGE EUR 125.00 FOR NO-SHOW. WAIVED FOR DEATH OF PASSENGER OR FAMILY MEMBER. NOTE - CHILD DISCOUNT DOES NOT APPLY INFANT NOT OCCUPYING A SEAT FREE OF CHARGE ----- MOST RESTRICTIVE CONDITIONS APPLY WITHIN A PRICING UNIT WITH FOLLOWING EXCEPTION WHEN COMBINING A REFUNDABLE FARE WITH A NON- REFUNDABLE FARE 1. THE AMOUNT PAID ON THE REFUNDABLE FARE COMPONENT IS REFUNDED MINUS ANY APPLICABLE PENALTY 2. THE AMOUNT PAID ON THE NON-REFUNDABLE FARE COMPONENT WILL NOT BE REFUNDED BOTH NONREFUNDABLE AMOUNT AND PENALTY SHALL BE ADDED AS REFUND FEES. ----- IN CASE OF REFUND MADE WITHIN 24HOURS BEFORE FLIGHT OR AFTER FLIGHT DEPARTURE REFUND OR NOSHOW CHARGE WILL BE APPLIED WHICHEVER IS HIGHER. ----- FUEL- INSURANCE SURCHARGES ARE REFUNDABLE. SERVICE CHARGE IS NON-REFUNDABLE. ----- REFUND OF UNUSED FEES AND TAXES PERMITTED. UNLESS APPLICABLE OW/RT FARE PLUS TAXES FOR ACTUAL TRAVEL IS HIGHER THAN WHOLE ORIGINAL TICKET. IN THIS CASE NO TAX OR FEE REFUND WILL BE PERMITTED. IN CASE OF NONREFUNDABLE FARES AFTER DEPARTURE NO TAX REFUND. ----- THE NONREFUNDABLE AMOUNT REMAINS NONREFUNDABLE EVEN IF UPGRADED TO A HIGHER FARE. IN THIS CASE REFUND PENALTY WILL EQUAL NONREFUNDABLE AMOUNT PLUS REFUND PENALTY OF THE HIGHER FARE. ----- IN CASE OF TICKET ISSUED USING INCORRECT RBD A CHARGE OF EGP500 WILL BE CHARGED PLUS FARE DIFFERENCE IF ANY ----- TICKET COUPONS MUST BE USED IN SEQUENCE. ANY UNUSED COUPON PRECEDING A USED COUPON CANNOT BE USED/ REISSUED AND MAY ONLY BE REFUNDED. ----- FULL REFUND PERMITTED BEFORE DEPARTURE IN CASE OF REJECTION OF VISA. EMBASSY STATEMENT REQUIRED. EXCEPTION NOT APPLICABLE FOR GROUPS OR HAJJ AND UMRA PASSENGERS. ----- 
CHANGES 
ANY TIME CHARGE EUR 70.00 FOR REISSUE/REVALIDATION. WAIVED FOR DEATH OF PASSENGER OR FAMILY MEMBER. NOTE - CHILD DISCOUNT DOES NOT APPLY INFANT NOT OCCUPYING A SEAT FREE OF CHARGE ----- IN CASE OF REISSUE/ REVALIDATION 24HOURS BEFORE FLIGHT OR AFTER FLIGHT DEPARTURE ONLY NOSHOW FEES TO BE APPLIED. ----- UPGRADE TO HIGHER COMPARTMENT ON SAME FLIGHT/SAME DATE IS PERMITTED WITHOUT A CHARGE ONLY FARE DIFFERENCE TO BE COLLECTED. ----- REISSUE MUST BE COMPLETED 24 HOURS BEFORE FLIGHT DEPARTURE OR WILL BE CHARGED AS NOSHOW. ----- FEE APPLIED PER CHANGED FARE COMPONANT. IF MULTIPLE CHANGES ARE MADE AT THE SAME TIME HIGHEST FEE WILL BE APPLIED OF ALL  CHANGED FARE COMPONANTS. ----- REISSUE RESULTING FARE MUST BE EQUAL OR HIGHER THAN PREVIOUS BASIC FARE. EXCEPTION FROM BUSINESS CLASS TO Y RBD FARES IS PERMITTED. ----- IN CASE OF REISSUE OF UNUSED TICKET APPLY CURRENT FARES. EXCEPTION FOR CHANGE OF ONLY INBOUND FARE COMPONENT APPLY HISTORICAL FARE. BOTH CHANGE FEES AND DIFFERENCE IN FARE TO BE COLLECTED. ----- IN CASE OF REISSUE OF PARTIAL USED TICKETS APPLY HISTORICAL FARES RECALCULATED FROM THE LAST FARE BREAK POINT. ALL CONDITIONS OF THE NEW FARES MUST BE COMPLIED WITH BOTH CHANGE FEES AND DIFFERENCE IN FARE TO BE COLLECTED. ----- INVOLUNTARY CHANGES TO BE EXECUTED FROM EGYPTAIR SALES OFFICES OR CALL CENTER ONLY. TRAVEL AGENTS ARE NOT ALLOWED TO ISSUE INVOLUNTARY TICKETS.

rules_general_info:
RU.RULE APPLICATION AT  FARES APPLICATION CLASS OF SERVICE THESE FARES APPLY FOR ECONOMY CLASS SERVICE. TYPES OF TRANSPORTATION THIS RULE GOVERNS ONE-WAY AND ROUND-TRIP FARES. FARES GOVERNED BY THIS RULE CAN BE USED TO CREATE ONE-WAY/ROUND-TRIP/OPEN-JAW/SINGLE OPEN-JAW JOURNEYS. FARES ONLY APPLY IF PURCHASED BEFORE DEPARTURE. CAPACITY LIMITATIONS THE CARRIER SHALL LIMIT THE NUMBER OF PASSENGERS CARRIED ON ANY ONE FLIGHT AT FARES GOVERNED BY THIS RULE AND SUCH FARES WILL NOT NECESSARILY BE AVAILABLE ON ALL FLIGHTS. THE NUMBER OF SEATS WHICH THE CARRIER SHALL MAKE AVAILABLE ON A GIVEN FLIGHT WILL BE DETERMINED BY THE CARRIERS BEST JUDGMENT OTHER CONDITIONS FULL AND SEQUENTIAL USE OF FLIGHT COUPONS- THE TICKET/ OR ELECTRONIC TICKET / IS NOT VALID IF THE FIRST COUPON HAS NOT BEEN USED AND WILL NOT BE HONORED IF ALL THE COUPONS ARE NOT USED IN THE SEQUENCE PROVIDED IN THE TICKET / OR ELECTRONIC TICKET / . THE FARE THAT APPLIES ON THE DATE OF PURCHASE IS ONLY VALID FOR THE ENTIRE ITINERARY AND THE SPECIFIC TRAVEL DATES MENTIONED ON THE TICKET. ANY MODIFICATION MAY REQUIRE THE PAYMENT OF AN ADDITIONAL AMOUNT. MX.MAX STAY

CO.COMBINABILITY APPLICABLE ADD-ON CONSTRUCTION IS ADDRESSED IN MISCELLANEOUS PROVISIONS - CATEGORY 23. END-ON-END END-ON-END COMBINATIONS PERMITTED WITH DOMESTIC FARES. VALIDATE ALL FARE COMPONENTS. FARES MUST BE SHOWN SEPARATELY ON THE TICKET. TRAVEL MUST BE VIA THE POINT OF COMBINATION. SIDE TRIPS PERMITTED. OPEN JAWS/ROUND TRIPS/CIRCLE TRIPS FARES MAY BE COMBINED ON A HALF ROUND TRIP BASIS -TO FORM SINGLE OR DOUBLE OPEN JAWS/ROUND TRIPS/CIRCLE TRIPS. THIS FARE MUST NOT BE USED AS THE HIGH OR THE LOW FARE WHEN CALCULATING A DIFFERENTIAL. THIS FARE MUST NOT BE USED AS THE THROUGH FARE WHEN PRICING A FARE COMPONENT WITH A DIFFERENTIAL. rules_penalties:
PE.PENALTIES FOR QA0WAEUA TYPE FARES 
CANCELLATIONS 
BEFORE DEPARTURE CHARGE EUR 280.00 FOR REFUND. CHILD/INFANT DISCOUNTS APPLY. CHARGE EUR 280.00 FOR NO-SHOW. CHILD/INFANT DISCOUNTS APPLY. 
AFTER DEPARTURE TICKET IS NON-REFUNDABLE IN CASE OF REFUND. TICKET IS NON-REFUNDABLE IN CASE OF NO-SHOW. NOTE - THE YQ REFUND FOLLOWS THE SAME CONDITIONS OF THE APPLICABLE FARE. 
CHANGES 
ANY TIME PER DIRECTION CHARGE EUR 60.00 FOR REISSUE/ REVALIDATION. PER DIRECTION CHARGE EUR 110.00 FOR NO-SHOW. NOTE - UPGRADE TO HIGHER FARE MUST BE TO THE HIGHER AVAILABLE CLASS IN THE FLIGHT DATE DISPLAY.

rules_general_info:
RU.RULE APPLICATION AT  FARES APPLICATION CLASS OF SERVICE THESE FARES APPLY FOR ECONOMY CLASS SERVICE. TYPES OF TRANSPORTATION THIS RULE GOVERNS ONE-WAY AND ROUND-TRIP FARES. FARES GOVERNED BY THIS RULE CAN BE USED TO CREATE ONE-WAY/ROUND-TRIP/OPEN-JAW/SINGLE OPEN-JAW JOURNEYS. FARES ONLY APPLY IF PURCHASED BEFORE DEPARTURE. CAPACITY LIMITATIONS THE CARRIER SHALL LIMIT THE NUMBER OF PASSENGERS CARRIED ON ANY ONE FLIGHT AT FARES GOVERNED BY THIS RULE AND SUCH FARES WILL NOT NECESSARILY BE AVAILABLE ON ALL FLIGHTS. THE NUMBER OF SEATS WHICH THE CARRIER SHALL MAKE AVAILABLE ON A GIVEN FLIGHT WILL BE DETERMINED BY THE CARRIERS BEST JUDGMENT OTHER CONDITIONS FULL AND SEQUENTIAL USE OF FLIGHT COUPONS- THE TICKET/ OR ELECTRONIC TICKET / IS NOT VALID IF THE FIRST COUPON HAS NOT BEEN USED AND WILL NOT BE HONORED IF ALL THE COUPONS ARE NOT USED IN THE SEQUENCE PROVIDED IN THE TICKET / OR ELECTRONIC TICKET / . THE FARE THAT APPLIES ON THE DATE OF PURCHASE IS ONLY VALID FOR THE ENTIRE ITINERARY AND THE SPECIFIC TRAVEL DATES MENTIONED ON THE TICKET. ANY MODIFICATION MAY REQUIRE THE PAYMENT OF AN ADDITIONAL AMOUNT. MX.MAX STAY 
TRAVEL FROM LAST STOPOVER MUST COMMENCE NO LATER THAN 12 MONTHS AFTER DEPARTURE FROM FARE ORIGIN. SR.SALES RESTRICT FROM/TO MIDDLE EAST

IF THE FARE COMPONENT IS ON ONE OR MORE OF THE FOLLOWING AT FLIGHTS 5000 THROUGH 5999 AT FLIGHTS 9000 THROUGH 9999 TICKETS MUST BE ISSUED ON AT  AND MAY NOT BE SOLD IN LEBANON/NIGERIA/ANGOLA/EGYPT/RUSSIA AP.ADVANCE RES/TKT 
RESERVATIONS ARE REQUIRED FOR ALL SECTORS. FL.FLT APPLICATION FROM/TO DOH 
IF TRAVEL COMMENCES ON/AFTER 16NOV 22 AND ON/BEFORE 19NOV 22 THE FARE COMPONENT MUST NOT BE ON ONE OR MORE OF THE FOLLOWING AT FLIGHTS 9000 THROUGH 9999 OPERATED BY AT AT FLIGHTS 5000 THROUGH 5999 OPERATED BY AT. 
IF TRAVEL COMMENCES ON/AFTER 20NOV 22 AND ON/BEFORE 04DEC 22 THE FARE COMPONENT MUST NOT BE ON ONE OR MORE OF THE FOLLOWING AT FLIGHTS 216 THROUGH 217 OPERATED BY AT AT FLIGHTS 2200 THROUGH 2300 OPERATED BY AT AT FLIGHTS 5000 THROUGH 5999 OPERATED BY AT AT FLIGHTS 9000 THROUGH 9999 OPERATED BY AT. 
IF TRAVEL COMMENCES ON/AFTER 05DEC 22 AND ON/BEFORE 20DEC 22 THE FARE COMPONENT MUST NOT BE ON ONE OR MORE OF THE FOLLOWING AT FLIGHTS 9000 THROUGH 9999 OPERATED BY AT AT FLIGHTS 5000 THROUGH 5999 OPERATED BY AT. 
IF TRAVEL COMMENCES ON/AFTER 16NOV 22 AND ON/BEFORE 20DEC 22 THE FARE COMPONENT MUST BE ON ONE OR MORE OF THE FOLLOWING ANY AT FLIGHT OPERATED BY AT. CD.CHILD DISCOUNTS 
ACCOMPANIED CHILD 2-11 - CHARGE 75 PERCENT OF THE FARE. TICKETING CODE - BASE FARE CODE PLUS CH. MUST BE ACCOMPANIED ON ALL FLIGHTS IN SAME COMPARTMENT BY ADULT 18 OR OLDER OR - INFANT UNDER 2 WITH A SEAT - CHARGE 75 PERCENT OF THE FARE. TICKETING CODE - BASE FARE CODE PLUS INS. MUST BE ACCOMPANIED ON ALL FLIGHTS IN SAME COMPARTMENT BY ADULT 18 OR OLDER OR - 1ST INFANT UNDER 2 WITHOUT A SEAT - CHARGE 10 PERCENT OF THE FARE. TICKETING CODE - BASE FARE CODE PLUS INF. MUST BE ACCOMPANIED ON ALL FLIGHTS IN SAME COMPARTMENT BY ADULT 18 OR OLDER OR - UNACCOMPANIED CHILD 4-14 - CHARGE 100 PERCENT OF THE FARE PLUS EUR 50.00. TICKETING CODE - BASE FARE CODE PLUS UM. AD.AGTS DISCOUNTS NONE UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED SO.STOPOVERS FOR QA0WAEUA TYPE FARES   NOTE - GENERAL RULE DOES NOT APPLY 
2 FREE STOPOVERS PERMITTED ON THE PRICING UNIT - 1 IN EACH DIRECTION. A STOPOVER MAY NOT EXCEED 7 DAYS. TF.TRANSFERS/RTGS 
UNLIMITED TRANSFERS PERMITTED ON THE PRICING UNIT FARE BREAK SURFACE SECTORS NOT PERMITTED AND EMBEDDED SURFACE SECTORS PERMITTED ON THE FARE COMPONENT. SU.SURCHARGES 
IF THE FARE COMPONENT INCLUDES TRAVEL BETWEEN DXB AND CMN AIRPORT ON ONE OR MORE OF THE FOLLOWING ANY EK FLIGHT OPERATED BY EK A SURCHARGE OF EUR 220.00 PER DIRECTION WILL BE ADDED TO THE APPLICABLE FARE FOR TRAVEL. 
IF THE FARE COMPONENT INCLUDES TRAVEL BETWEEN DXB AND CMN AIRPORT ON ONE OR MORE OF THE FOLLOWING AT FLIGHTS 9000 THROUGH 9999 OPERATED BY EK A SURCHARGE OF EUR 220.00 PER DIRECTION WILL BE ADDED TO THE APPLICABLE FARE FOR TRAVEL. 
IF THE FARE COMPONENT INCLUDES TRAVEL BETWEEN SAUDI ARABIA AND CMN AIRPORT ON ONE OR MORE OF THE FOLLOWING ANY SV FLIGHT OPERATED BY SV A SURCHARGE OF EUR 220.00 PER DIRECTION WILL BE ADDED TO THE APPLICABLE FARE FOR TRAVEL. 
IF THE FARE COMPONENT INCLUDES TRAVEL BETWEEN SAUDI ARABIA AND CMN AIRPORT ON ONE OR MORE OF THE FOLLOWING AT FLIGHTS 9000 THROUGH 9999 OPERATED BY SV A SURCHARGE OF EUR 220.00 PER DIRECTION WILL BE ADDED TO THE APPLICABLE FARE FOR TRAVEL. 
IF THE FARE COMPONENT INCLUDES TRAVEL BETWEEN CAI AND CMN AIRPORT ON ONE OR MORE OF THE FOLLOWING ANY MS FLIGHT OPERATED BY MS A SURCHARGE OF EUR 220.00 PER DIRECTION WILL BE ADDED TO THE APPLICABLE FARE FOR TRAVEL. 
IF THE FARE COMPONENT INCLUDES TRAVEL BETWEEN CAI AND CMN AIRPORT ON ONE OR MORE OF THE FOLLOWING AT FLIGHTS 9000 THROUGH 9999 OPERATED BY MS A SURCHARGE OF EUR 220.00 PER DIRECTION WILL BE ADDED TO THE APPLICABLE FARE FOR TRAVEL. *** GENERAL RULE FOLLOWS *** FROM/TO MAD FOR QA0WAEUA TYPE FARES 
ORIGINATING MAD - A SURCHARGE OF 10 PERCENT OF THE FARE PER TICKET WILL BE ADDED TO THE APPLICABLE FARE FOR TRAVEL FROM 05JUN 23 THROUGH 06AUG 23. 
AND - A SURCHARGE OF 3 PERCENT OF THE FARE PER TICKET WILL BE ADDED TO THE APPLICABLE FARE FOR TRAVEL FROM 05JUN 23 THROUGH 06AUG 23. 
A SURCHARGE OF 3 PERCENT OF THE FARE PER TICKET WILL BE ADDED TO THE APPLICABLE FARE FOR TRAVEL. CO.COMBINABILITY APPLICABLE ADD-ON CONSTRUCTION IS ADDRESSED IN MISCELLANEOUS PROVISIONS - CATEGORY 23. END-ON-END END-ON-END COMBINATIONS PERMITTED WITH DOMESTIC FARES. VALIDATE ALL FARE COMPONENTS. FARES MUST BE SHOWN SEPARATELY ON THE TICKET. TRAVEL MUST BE VIA THE POINT OF COMBINATION. SIDE TRIPS PERMITTED. OPEN JAWS/ROUND TRIPS/CIRCLE TRIPS FARES MAY BE COMBINED ON A HALF ROUND TRIP BASIS -TO FORM SINGLE OR DOUBLE OPEN JAWS/ROUND TRIPS/CIRCLE TRIPS. PROVIDED - COMBINATIONS ARE WITH ANY FARE FOR CARRIER AT/AS IN ANY RULE AND TARIFF. MD.MISCELLANEOUS DATA 
THIS FARE MUST NOT BE USED AS THE HIGH OR THE LOW FARE WHEN CALCULATING A DIFFERENTIAL. THIS FARE MUST NOT BE USED AS THE THROUGH FARE WHEN PRICING A FARE COMPONENT WITH A DIFFERENTIAL. VC.VOLUNTARY CHANGES VOLUNTARY CHANGES CONDITIONS MAY APPLY FOR AUTOMATED REISSUE/REVALIDATION REFER TO PENALTIES CATEGORY *PE FOR DETAILS 
VR.VOLUNTARY REFUNDS VOLUNTARY CHANGES CONDITIONS MAY APPLY FOR AUTOMATED REFUNDS REFER TO PENALTIES CATEGORY *PE FOR DETAILS
rules_penalties:
PE.PENALTIES FOR QA0WAEUA TYPE FARES 
CANCELLATIONS 
BEFORE DEPARTURE CHARGE EUR 280.00 FOR REFUND. CHILD/INFANT DISCOUNTS APPLY. CHARGE EUR 280.00 FOR NO-SHOW. CHILD/INFANT DISCOUNTS APPLY. 
AFTER DEPARTURE TICKET IS NON-REFUNDABLE IN CASE OF REFUND. TICKET IS NON-REFUNDABLE IN CASE OF NO-SHOW. NOTE - THE YQ REFUND FOLLOWS THE SAME CONDITIONS OF THE APPLICABLE FARE. 
CHANGES 
ANY TIME PER DIRECTION CHARGE EUR 60.00 FOR REISSUE/ REVALIDATION. PER DIRECTION CHARGE EUR 110.00 FOR NO-SHOW. NOTE - UPGRADE TO HIGHER FARE MUST BE TO THE HIGHER AVAILABLE CLASS IN THE FLIGHT DATE DISPLAY.

rules_general_info:
RU.RULE APPLICATION RESTRICTED ONE WAY AND ROUND TRIP PC FARES APPLICATION CLASS OF SERVICE THESE FARES APPLY FOR ECONOMY CLASS SERVICE. TYPES OF TRANSPORTATION FARES GOVERNED BY THIS RULE CAN BE USED TO CREATE ONE-WAY/ROUND-TRIP/OPEN-JAW JOURNEYS. SE.SEASONS FOR QOWBYD1W TYPE FARES 
PERMITTED 29OCT 23 THROUGH 30MAR 24 FOR EACH TRIP. SR.SALES RESTRICT 
TICKETS MUST BE ISSUED ON PC  AND MAY NOT BE SOLD IN EGYPT AND MAY ONLY BE SOLD IN AREA 1/AREA 2/AREA 3 AP.ADVANCE RES/TKT 
RESERVATIONS FOR ALL SECTORS ARE REQUIRED AT LEAST 75 MINUTES BEFORE DEPARTURE. TICKETING MUST BE COMPLETED THE DAY RESERVATIONS ARE MADE. FL.FLT APPLICATION FOR FARES VIA RTG100 
THE FARE COMPONENT MUST NOT BE ON ONE OR MORE OF THE FOLLOWING PC FLIGHTS 7500 THROUGH 7999. AND THE FARE COMPONENT MUST BE ON ONE OR MORE OF THE FOLLOWING ANY PC FLIGHT OPERATED BY PC BUT NOT ON DIRECT FLIGHTS. CD.CHILD DISCOUNTS FOR ONE WAY FARES 
ACCOMPANIED CHILD 2-11 - NO DISCOUNT OR - UNACCOMPANIED CHILD 8-11 - NO DISCOUNT OR - INFANT UNDER 2 WITHOUT A SEAT - CHARGE USD 46.00. MUST BE ACCOMPANIED ON ALL FLIGHTS IN SAME COMPARTMENT BY ADULT. SO.STOPOVERS 
2 STOPOVERS PERMITTED ON THE PRICING UNIT LIMITED TO 1 FREE AND 1 AT EUR 50.00. 1 FREE IN TURKEY/FRU 1 IN TURKEY/FRU AT EUR 50.00. A STOPOVER MAY NOT EXCEED 24 HOURS. TF.TRANSFERS/RTGS 
4 FREE TRANSFERS PERMITTED ON THE PRICING UNIT - 2 IN EACH DIRECTION FREE IN TURKEY FREE IN ITALY FARE BREAK AND EMBEDDED SURFACE SECTORS NOT PERMITTED ON THE FARE COMPONENT. SU.SURCHARGES FOR QOWBYD1W TYPE FARES 
THE PROVISIONS BELOW APPLY ONLY AS FOLLOWS - RESERVATIONS ARE REQUIRED AT LEAST 60 DAYS BEFORE DEPARTURE. OPEN RETURNS NOT PERMITTED. THERE IS NO CHARGE FOR TRAVEL PER DIRECTION. 
THE PROVISIONS BELOW APPLY ONLY AS FOLLOWS - RESERVATIONS ARE REQUIRED AT LEAST 10 DAYS BEFORE DEPARTURE. OPEN RETURNS NOT PERMITTED. A SURCHARGE OF EUR 6.60 PER DIRECTION WILL BE ADDED TO THE APPLICABLE FARE FOR TRAVEL. 
THE PROVISIONS BELOW APPLY ONLY AS FOLLOWS - RESERVATIONS ARE REQUIRED AT LEAST 24 HOURS BEFORE DEPARTURE. OPEN RETURNS NOT PERMITTED. RESERVATIONS AND TICKETING MUST BE COMPLETED AT THE SAME TIME. A SURCHARGE OF EUR 10.00 PER DIRECTION WILL BE ADDED TO THE APPLICABLE FARE FOR TRAVEL. 
THE PROVISIONS BELOW APPLY ONLY AS FOLLOWS - RESERVATIONS ARE REQUIRED AT LEAST 6 HOURS BEFORE DEPARTURE. OPEN RETURNS NOT PERMITTED. RESERVATIONS AND TICKETING MUST BE COMPLETED AT THE SAME TIME. A SURCHARGE OF EUR 10.00 PER DIRECTION WILL BE ADDED TO THE APPLICABLE FARE FOR TRAVEL. AND - A SURCHARGE OF 10 PERCENT OF THE FARE PER DIRECTION WILL BE ADDED TO THE APPLICABLE FARE FOR TRAVEL. 
OTHERWISE A SURCHARGE OF EUR 10.00 PER DIRECTION WILL BE ADDED TO THE APPLICABLE FARE FOR TRAVEL. AND - A SURCHARGE OF 15 PERCENT OF THE FARE PER DIRECTION WILL BE ADDED TO THE APPLICABLE FARE FOR TRAVEL. CO.COMBINABILITY FOR ONE WAY FARES CIRCLE TRIPS NOT PERMITTED. END-ON-END NOT PERMITTED. SIDE TRIPS NOT PERMITTED APPLICABLE ADD-ON CONSTRUCTION IS ADDRESSED IN MISCELLANEOUS PROVISIONS - CATEGORY 23. OPEN JAWS/ROUND TRIPS FARES MAY BE COMBINED ON A HALF ROUND TRIP BASIS -TO FORM SINGLE OR DOUBLE OPEN JAWS. A MAXIMUM OF TWO INTERNATIONAL FARE COMPONENTS PERMITTED. THE MILEAGE FOR AN INTERNATIONAL OPEN SEGMENT IS EQUAL TO OR LESS THAN THE MILEAGE FOR THE SHORTEST FLOWN FARE COMPONENT. THERE IS NO MILEAGE RESTRICTION ON AN OPEN SEGMENT WITHIN ONE COUNTRY. -TO FORM ROUND TRIPS PROVIDED - COMBINATIONS ARE WITH ANY FARE FOR CARRIER PC/ZM IN ANY RULE AND TARIFF. HI.HIGHER INTERMEDIATE POINT 
AREA 2/AREA 3 ARE EXCLUDED FROM THE HIGHER INTERMEDIATE POINT RULE. VC.VOLUNTARY CHANGES VOLUNTARY CHANGES CONDITIONS MAY APPLY FOR AUTOMATED REISSUE/REVALIDATION REFER TO PENALTIES CATEGORY *PE FOR DETAILS 
VR.VOLUNTARY REFUNDS VOLUNTARY CHANGES CONDITIONS MAY APPLY FOR AUTOMATED REFUNDS REFER TO PENALTIES CATEGORY *PE FOR DETAILS
rules_ticket_endorsment:
TE.TKT ENDORSEMENT 
THE ORIGINAL AND THE REISSUED TICKET MUST BE ANNOTATED - NONEND/PC ONLY - IN THE ENDORSEMENT BOX.
rules_penalties:
PE.PENALTIES 
CHANGES 
ANY TIME TICKET IS NON-REFUNDABLE. CHANGES NOT PERMITTED IN CASE OF REISSUE. NOTE - NO CHNG PERMTTED. -- IF OUTBOUND NO SHOW NO CHANGE PERMITTED. NEW OW MUST BE ISSUED. INBOUND CAN BE CHANGED ACCORDING TO THE FARE RULES. -- CHANGES CAN BE PERFORMED TO THE SAME RBD OR TO A HIGHER RBD. NO REFUND OF ANY RESIDUAL VALUE APPLICABLE. -- WHERE THIS FARE IS COMBINED WITH ANOTHER FARE AND ONLY ONE FARE COMPONENT IS CHANGED  THE PENALTY CONDITIONS OF THE CHANGED FARE COMPONENT WILL APPLY WHEN MORE THAN ONE FARE COMPONENT IS CHANGED THEN THE SUM OF THE PENALTY OF ALL CHANGED FARE COMPONENTS WILL APPLY. -- CHANGE FEE MUST BE COLLECTED AS CP TAX. -- CHANGES PERMITTED FOR REROUTING/REBOOKING PROVIDED THE FOLLOWING CONDITIONS ARE COMPLIED WITH- REROUTING/REBOOKING PERMITTED PROVIDED ALL CONDITIONS OF THE NEW FARE INCLUDING ADVANCE PURCHASE AND COMBINABILITY ARE COMPLIED WITH IRRESPECTIVE IF CHANGE OCCURS TO OUTBOUND OR INBOUND FLIGHT. WHEN THE NEW ITINERARY RESULTS IN A HIGHER FARE THE DIFFERENCE WILL BE COLLECTED - AND - THE CHANGE FEE WILL BE APPLIED. WHEN THE NEW ITINERARY RESULTS IN A LOWER FARE NO RESIDUAL AMOUNT WILL BE MADE - AND - THE CHANGE FEE WILL BE APPLIED. 
CANCELLATIONS 
ANY TIME TICKET IS NON-REFUNDABLE. NOTE - TICKET IS NON REFUNDABLE IN CASE OF NOSHOW/CANCEL/REFUND -- YQ SURCHARGE IS NON REFUNDABLE YR SURCHARGE IS NON REFUNDABLE -- CHARGES SHALL NOT BE WAIVED FOR MEDICAL REASONS 
TICKET IS NON-REFUNDABLE IN CASE OF NO-SHOW. NOTE - YQ SURCHARGE IS NON REFUNDABLE YR SURCHARGE IS NON REFUNDABLE IN CASE OF NO-SHOW AIRPORT TAXES ARE REFUNDABLE IF THE REFUND REQUEST SHALL BE DONE ONLY BY OUR GUESTS DIRECTLY THROUGH FLYPGS.COM-EXCEPT POINT OF SALE ISRAEL

NO REFUND OF ANY RESIDUAL VALUE APPLICABLE. -- WHERE THIS FARE IS COMBINED WITH ANOTHER FARE AND ONLY ONE FARE COMPONENT IS CHANGED  THE PENALTY CONDITIONS OF THE CHANGED FARE COMPONENT WILL APPLY WHEN MORE THAN ONE FARE COMPONENT IS CHANGED THEN THE SUM OF THE PENALTY OF ALL CHANGED FARE COMPONENTS WILL APPLY. -- CHANGE FEE MUST BE COLLECTED AS CP TAX. -- CHANGES PERMITTED FOR REROUTING/REBOOKING PROVIDED THE FOLLOWING CONDITIONS ARE COMPLIED WITH- REROUTING/REBOOKING PERMITTED PROVIDED ALL CONDITIONS OF THE NEW FARE INCLUDING ADVANCE PURCHASE AND COMBINABILITY ARE COMPLIED WITH IRRESPECTIVE IF CHANGE OCCURS TO OUTBOUND OR INBOUND FLIGHT. WHEN THE NEW ITINERARY RESULTS IN A HIGHER FARE THE DIFFERENCE WILL BE COLLECTED - AND - THE CHANGE FEE WILL BE APPLIED. WHEN THE NEW ITINERARY RESULTS IN A LOWER FARE NO RESIDUAL AMOUNT WILL BE MADE - AND - THE CHANGE FEE WILL BE APPLIED. 
CANCELLATIONS 
ANY TIME TICKET IS NON-REFUNDABLE. NOTE - TICKET IS NON REFUNDABLE IN CASE OF NOSHOW/CANCEL/REFUND -- YQ SURCHARGE IS NON REFUNDABLE YR SURCHARGE IS NON REFUNDABLE -- CHARGES SHALL NOT BE WAIVED FOR MEDICAL REASONS 
TICKET IS NON-REFUNDABLE IN CASE OF NO-SHOW. NOTE - YQ SURCHARGE IS NON REFUNDABLE YR SURCHARGE IS NON REFUNDABLE IN CASE OF NO-SHOW AIRPORT TAXES ARE REFUNDABLE IF THE REFUND REQUEST SHALL BE DONE ONLY BY OUR GUESTS DIRECTLY THROUGH FLYPGS.COM-EXCEPT POINT OF SALE ISRAEL

rules_general_info:
RU.RULE APPLICATION RESTRICTED ONE WAY AND ROUND TRIP PC FARES APPLICATION CLASS OF SERVICE THESE FARES APPLY FOR ECONOMY CLASS SERVICE. TYPES OF TRANSPORTATION FARES GOVERNED BY THIS RULE CAN BE USED TO CREATE ONE-WAY/ROUND-TRIP/OPEN-JAW JOURNEYS. SE.SEASONS FOR QOWBYD1W TYPE FARES 
PERMITTED 29OCT 23 THROUGH 30MAR 24 FOR EACH TRIP. SR.SALES RESTRICT 
TICKETS MUST BE ISSUED ON PC  AND MAY NOT BE SOLD IN EGYPT AND MAY ONLY BE SOLD IN AREA 1/AREA 2/AREA 3 AP.ADVANCE RES/TKT 
RESERVATIONS FOR ALL SECTORS ARE REQUIRED AT LEAST 75 MINUTES BEFORE DEPARTURE. TICKETING MUST BE COMPLETED THE DAY RESERVATIONS ARE MADE. FL.FLT APPLICATION FOR FARES VIA RTG100 
THE FARE COMPONENT MUST NOT BE ON ONE OR MORE OF THE FOLLOWING PC FLIGHTS 7500 THROUGH 7999. AND THE FARE COMPONENT MUST BE ON ONE OR MORE OF THE FOLLOWING ANY PC FLIGHT OPERATED BY PC BUT NOT ON DIRECT FLIGHTS. CD.CHILD DISCOUNTS FOR ONE WAY FARES 
ACCOMPANIED CHILD 2-11 - NO DISCOUNT OR - UNACCOMPANIED CHILD 8-11 - NO DISCOUNT OR - INFANT UNDER 2 WITHOUT A SEAT - CHARGE USD 46.00. MUST BE ACCOMPANIED ON ALL FLIGHTS IN SAME COMPARTMENT BY ADULT. SO.STOPOVERS 
2 STOPOVERS PERMITTED ON THE PRICING UNIT LIMITED TO 1 FREE AND 1 AT EUR 50.00. 1 FREE IN TURKEY/FRU 1 IN TURKEY/FRU AT EUR 50.00. A STOPOVER MAY NOT EXCEED 24 HOURS. TF.TRANSFERS/RTGS 
4 FREE TRANSFERS PERMITTED ON THE PRICING UNIT - 2 IN EACH DIRECTION FREE IN TURKEY FREE IN ITALY FARE BREAK AND EMBEDDED SURFACE SECTORS NOT PERMITTED ON THE FARE COMPONENT. SU.SURCHARGES FOR QOWBYD1W TYPE FARES 
THE PROVISIONS BELOW APPLY ONLY AS FOLLOWS - RESERVATIONS ARE REQUIRED AT LEAST 60 DAYS BEFORE DEPARTURE. OPEN RETURNS NOT PERMITTED. THERE IS NO CHARGE FOR TRAVEL PER DIRECTION. 
THE PROVISIONS BELOW APPLY ONLY AS FOLLOWS - RESERVATIONS ARE REQUIRED AT LEAST 10 DAYS BEFORE DEPARTURE. OPEN RETURNS NOT PERMITTED. A SURCHARGE OF EUR 6.60 PER DIRECTION WILL BE ADDED TO THE APPLICABLE FARE FOR TRAVEL. 
THE PROVISIONS BELOW APPLY ONLY AS FOLLOWS - RESERVATIONS ARE REQUIRED AT LEAST 24 HOURS BEFORE DEPARTURE. OPEN RETURNS NOT PERMITTED. RESERVATIONS AND TICKETING MUST BE COMPLETED AT THE SAME TIME. A SURCHARGE OF EUR 10.00 PER DIRECTION WILL BE ADDED TO THE APPLICABLE FARE FOR TRAVEL. 
THE PROVISIONS BELOW APPLY ONLY AS FOLLOWS - RESERVATIONS ARE REQUIRED AT LEAST 6 HOURS BEFORE DEPARTURE. OPEN RETURNS NOT PERMITTED. RESERVATIONS AND TICKETING MUST BE COMPLETED AT THE SAME TIME. A SURCHARGE OF EUR 10.00 PER DIRECTION WILL BE ADDED TO THE APPLICABLE FARE FOR TRAVEL. AND - A SURCHARGE OF 10 PERCENT OF THE FARE PER DIRECTION WILL BE ADDED TO THE APPLICABLE FARE FOR TRAVEL. 
OTHERWISE A SURCHARGE OF EUR 10.00 PER DIRECTION WILL BE ADDED TO THE APPLICABLE FARE FOR TRAVEL. AND - A SURCHARGE OF 15 PERCENT OF THE FARE PER DIRECTION WILL BE ADDED TO THE APPLICABLE FARE FOR TRAVEL. CO.COMBINABILITY FOR ONE WAY FARES CIRCLE TRIPS NOT PERMITTED. END-ON-END NOT PERMITTED. SIDE TRIPS NOT PERMITTED APPLICABLE ADD-ON CONSTRUCTION IS ADDRESSED IN MISCELLANEOUS PROVISIONS - CATEGORY 23. OPEN JAWS/ROUND TRIPS FARES MAY BE COMBINED ON A HALF ROUND TRIP BASIS -TO FORM SINGLE OR DOUBLE OPEN JAWS. A MAXIMUM OF TWO INTERNATIONAL FARE COMPONENTS PERMITTED. THE MILEAGE FOR AN INTERNATIONAL OPEN SEGMENT IS EQUAL TO OR LESS THAN THE MILEAGE FOR THE SHORTEST FLOWN FARE COMPONENT. THERE IS NO MILEAGE RESTRICTION ON AN OPEN SEGMENT WITHIN ONE COUNTRY. -TO FORM ROUND TRIPS PROVIDED - COMBINATIONS ARE WITH ANY FARE FOR CARRIER PC/ZM IN ANY RULE AND TARIFF. HI.HIGHER INTERMEDIATE POINT 
AREA 2/AREA 3 ARE EXCLUDED FROM THE HIGHER INTERMEDIATE POINT RULE. VC.VOLUNTARY CHANGES VOLUNTARY CHANGES CONDITIONS MAY APPLY FOR AUTOMATED REISSUE/REVALIDATION REFER TO PENALTIES CATEGORY *PE FOR DETAILS 
VR.VOLUNTARY REFUNDS VOLUNTARY CHANGES CONDITIONS MAY APPLY FOR AUTOMATED REFUNDS REFER TO PENALTIES CATEGORY *PE FOR DETAILS
rules_ticket_endorsment:

THE ORIGINAL AND THE REISSUED TICKET MUST BE ANNOTATED - NONEND/PC ONLY - IN THE ENDORSEMENT BOX.

rules_general_info:
RU.RULE APPLICATION AIR ALGERIE PROMO FARES BETWEEN MIDDLE EAST AND EUROP APPLICATION AREA THESE FARES APPLY BETWEEN MIDDLE EAST TO EUROPE. CLASS OF SERVICE THESE FARES APPLY FOR ECONOMY CLASS SERVICE. TYPES OF TRANSPORTATION FARES GOVERNED BY THIS RULE CAN BE USED TO CREATE ROUND-TRIP/CIRCLE-TRIP/SINGLE OPEN-JAW JOURNEYS. CAPACITY LIMITATIONS THE CARRIER SHALL LIMIT THE NUMBER OF PASSENGERS CARRIED ON ANY ONE FLIGHT AT FARES GOVERNED BY THIS RULE AND SUCH FARES WILL NOT NECESSARILY BE AVAILABLE ON ALL FLIGHTS. THE NUMBER OF SEATS WHICH THE CARRIER SHALL MAKE AVAILABLE ON A GIVEN FLIGHT WILL BE DETERMINED BY THE CARRIERS BEST JUDGMENT MX.MAX STAY NONE UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED SR.SALES RESTRICT 
EXTENSION OF TICKET VALIDITY IS NOT PERMITTED. NOTE - REROUTING PERMITTED WITH AH ONLY. *** GENERAL RULE FOLLOWS *** 
TICKETS MUST BE ISSUED ON AH  OR HR. OR - TICKETS MUST BE ISSUED ON AH  OR GP. AP.ADVANCE RES/TKT 
RESERVATIONS ARE REQUIRED FOR ALL SECTORS. NOTE - TTL ROBOT REMARK. WARNING ALL RESERVATIONS MADE WITHOUT TICKET NUMBER CAN BE CANCELLED AT ANY TIME BY THE CARRIER. CD.CHILD DISCOUNTS 
ACCOMPANIED CHILD 2-11 - CHARGE 75 PERCENT OF THE FARE. TICKETING CODE - BASE FARE CODE PLUS CH. MUST BE ACCOMPANIED ON ALL FLIGHTS IN SAME COMPARTMENT BY ADULT 15 OR OLDER OR - INFANT UNDER 2 WITH A SEAT - CHARGE 75 PERCENT OF THE FARE. MUST BE ACCOMPANIED ON ALL FLIGHTS IN SAME COMPARTMENT BY ADULT 15 OR OLDER OR - 1ST INFANT UNDER 2 WITHOUT A SEAT - CHARGE 10 PERCENT OF THE FARE. MUST BE ACCOMPANIED ON ALL FLIGHTS IN SAME COMPARTMENT BY ADULT 15 OR OLDER OR - UNACCOMPANIED CHILD 5-11 - CHARGE 100 PERCENT OF THE FARE. AD.AGTS DISCOUNTS 
AGENT - NO DISCOUNT. OD.OTHER DISCOUNTS 
NOTE - NO OTHER DISCOUNTS PERMITTED. SO.STOPOVERS 
2 FREE STOPOVERS PERMITTED ON THE PRICING UNIT - 1 IN EACH DIRECTION IN ALGERIA. TF.TRANSFERS/RTGS 
2 FREE TRANSFERS PERMITTED ON THE PRICING UNIT - 1 IN EACH DIRECTION FREE IN ALGERIA FARE BREAK AND EMBEDDED SURFACE SECTORS PERMITTED ON THE FARE COMPONENT. CO.COMBINABILITY APPLICABLE ADD-ON CONSTRUCTION IS ADDRESSED IN MISCELLANEOUS PROVISIONS - CATEGORY 23. END-ON-END END-ON-END COMBINATIONS PERMITTED WITH AH  FARES. VALIDATE ALL FARE COMPONENTS. SIDE TRIPS PERMITTED. OPEN JAWS/ROUND TRIPS/CIRCLE TRIPS FARES MAY BE COMBINED ON A HALF ROUND TRIP BASIS -TO FORM SINGLE OR DOUBLE OPEN JAWS/ROUND TRIPS/CIRCLE TRIPS. PROVIDED - COMBINATIONS ARE WITH ANY FARE FOR CARRIER AH IN ANY RULE AND TARIFF. HI.HIGHER INTERMEDIATE POINT 
THE HIGHER INTERMEDIATE POINT RULE DOES NOT APPLY FOR CONNECTIONS. NOTE - HIP SURCHARGE MUST BE IGNORED AND - THE HIGHER INTERMEDIATE POINT RULE DOES NOT APPLY FOR STOPOVERS. NOTE - HIP SURCHARGE MUST BE IGNORED
rules_ticket_endorsment:
TE.TKT ENDORSEMENT 
THE ORIGINAL AND THE REISSUED TICKET MUST BE ANNOTATED - AH ONLY - IN THE ENDORSEMENT BOX.
rules_penalties:
PE.PENALTIES FOR QQAEUOO TYPE FARES 
CANCELLATIONS 
BEFORE DEPARTURE CHARGE EUR 100.00 FOR CANCEL/REFUND. CHARGE EUR 120.00 FOR NO-SHOW. CHILD/INFANT DISCOUNTS APPLY. 
AFTER DEPARTURE TICKET IS NON-REFUNDABLE. NOTE - A-NOTE BELOW TO BE APPLIED ON/AFTER 01 DECEMBER 17 ------------------------------------------------- A NOSHOW FOR A FLIGHT IS CONSIDERED WHEN A PASSENGER FAILS TO MODIFY THE RESERVATION THREE - 03 HOURS- BEFORE DEPARTURE OF THE ORIGINAL SCHEDULED FLIGHT -------------------------------------------------- REFUND RULES APPLY PER FARE COMPONENT. WHEN COMBINING NON-REFUNDABLE FARES WITH REFUNDABLE FARES 1.THE AMOUNT PAID ON EACH REFUNDABLE FARE COMPONENT IS REFUNDED. 2.THE AMOUNT PAID ON EACH NON-REFUNDABLE FARE COMPONENT WILL NOT BE REFUNDED 3.WHEN COMBINING FARES CHARGE THE SUM OF THE CANCELLATION PENALTIES OF ALL CANCELLED FARE COMPONENTS ----------------------------------------------- IF FARE COMPONENT IS NON REFUNDABLE YR FUEL SURCHARGE IS NON REFUNDABLE IF FARE COMPONENT IS REFUNDABLE -WITH OR WITHOUT A PENALTY- YR FUEL SURCHARGE IS REFUNDABLE ------------------------------------------------ REFUND PERMITTED WITHIN TICKET VALIDITY ------------------------------------------------ IN CASE OF THE PENALY FEES FOR REFUND IS HIGHER THAN THE FARE.THE REMAINING AMOUNT OF THE PENALTY WILL BE DEDUCTED FROM THE REFUNDABLE YR FUEL SURCHARGE AMOUNT ------------------------------------------------ 
CHANGES 
ANY TIME CHARGE EUR 70.00 FOR REISSUE. CHARGE EUR 120.00 FOR NO-SHOW. CHILD/INFANT DISCOUNTS APPLY. NOTE - B-NOTE BELOW TO BE APPLIED ON/AFTER 01 DECEMBER17 -------------------------------------------------- A CHANGE IS A DATE/FLIGHT/ROUTING/BOOKING CODE MODIFICATION. NEW RESERVATION AND REISSUE AND PAYEMENT MUST BE MADE ON THE SAME DAY AND SAME TIME OF CHANGES ------------------------------------------------- RULES FOR CHANGES APPLY PER FARE COMPONENT. IN CASE OF COMBINATION APPLY THE SUM OF CHANGE FEES OF ALL CHANGED FARE COMPONENTS ------------------------------------------------- A NOSHOW FOR A FLIGHT IS CONSIDERED WHEN A PASSENGER FAILS TO MODIFY THE RESERVATION THREE- 03HOURS-BEFORE DEPARTURE OF THE ORIGINAL SCHEDULED FLIGHT ------------------------------------------------- NOTE - -REPRICING CONDITIONS- ----------------------- A-BEFORE DEPARTURE- ITINERARY MUST BE RE-PRICED USING CURRENT FARES IN EFFECT ON THE DATE THE TICKET IS REISSUED THE ITINERARY MUST MEET ALL RULE PROVISIONS OF THE NEWLY TICKETED FARE INCLUDING ADVANCE PURCHASE ------------------------------------------------- NEW FARE MUST BE EQUAL OR HIGHER. WHEN THE NEW ITINERARY RESULTS IN A HIGHER FARE THE DIFFERENCE WILL BE COLLECTED AND THE CHANGE FEE WILL BE APPLIED ------------------------------------------------- DOWNGRADE IS PERMITTED ONLY FROM/TO NORMAL FARES. REFUND RESIDUAL VALUE OR ISSUE AN EMD FOR TRANSPORTATION ------------------------------------------------- WHEN THIS FARE IS COMBINED WITH ANOTHER FARE AND ONLY ONE FARE COMPONENT IS CHANGED THE PENALTY CONDITIONS OF THE CHANGED FARE COMPONENT WILL APPLY. WHEN MORE THAN ONE FARE COMPONENT IS BEING CHANGED THE SUM OF THE PENALTY OF ALL CHANGED FARE COMPONENTS WILL APPLY ------------------------------------------------- B-AFTER DEPARTURE THE ITINERARY MUST BE RE-PRICED USING HISTORICAL FARES IN EFFECT ON THE PREVIOUS TICKETING DATE THE NEW  ITINERARY MUST MEET ALL THE RULE PROVISIONS OF THE NEWLY TICKETED FARES SUCH THAT THE RECALCULATED FARE COULD HAVE BEEN USED FOR THE NEW ITINERARY IF PURCHASED ON THE ORIGINAL TICKET ISSUE DATE -----------------------------------------------

WHEN COMBINING NON-REFUNDABLE FARES WITH REFUNDABLE FARES 1.THE AMOUNT PAID ON EACH REFUNDABLE FARE COMPONENT IS REFUNDED. 2.THE AMOUNT PAID ON EACH NON-REFUNDABLE FARE COMPONENT WILL NOT BE REFUNDED 3.WHEN COMBINING FARES CHARGE THE SUM OF THE CANCELLATION PENALTIES OF ALL CANCELLED FARE COMPONENTS ----------------------------------------------- IF FARE COMPONENT IS NON REFUNDABLE YR FUEL SURCHARGE IS NON REFUNDABLE IF FARE COMPONENT IS REFUNDABLE -WITH OR WITHOUT A PENALTY- YR FUEL SURCHARGE IS REFUNDABLE ------------------------------------------------ REFUND PERMITTED WITHIN TICKET VALIDITY ------------------------------------------------ IN CASE OF THE PENALY FEES FOR REFUND IS HIGHER THAN THE FARE.THE REMAINING AMOUNT OF THE PENALTY WILL BE DEDUCTED FROM THE REFUNDABLE YR FUEL SURCHARGE AMOUNT ------------------------------------------------ 
CHANGES 
ANY TIME CHARGE EUR 70.00 FOR REISSUE. CHARGE EUR 120.00 FOR NO-SHOW. CHILD/INFANT DISCOUNTS APPLY. NOTE - B-NOTE BELOW TO BE APPLIED ON/AFTER 01 DECEMBER17 -------------------------------------------------- A CHANGE IS A DATE/FLIGHT/ROUTING/BOOKING CODE MODIFICATION. NEW RESERVATION AND REISSUE AND PAYEMENT MUST BE MADE ON THE SAME DAY AND SAME TIME OF CHANGES ------------------------------------------------- RULES FOR CHANGES APPLY PER FARE COMPONENT. IN CASE OF COMBINATION APPLY THE SUM OF CHANGE FEES OF ALL CHANGED FARE COMPONENTS ------------------------------------------------- A NOSHOW FOR A FLIGHT IS CONSIDERED WHEN A PASSENGER FAILS TO MODIFY THE RESERVATION THREE- 03HOURS-BEFORE DEPARTURE OF THE ORIGINAL SCHEDULED FLIGHT ------------------------------------------------- NOTE - -REPRICING CONDITIONS- ----------------------- A-BEFORE DEPARTURE- ITINERARY MUST BE RE-PRICED USING CURRENT FARES IN EFFECT ON THE DATE THE TICKET IS REISSUED THE ITINERARY MUST MEET ALL RULE PROVISIONS OF THE NEWLY TICKETED FARE INCLUDING ADVANCE PURCHASE ------------------------------------------------- NEW FARE MUST BE EQUAL OR HIGHER. WHEN THE NEW ITINERARY RESULTS IN A HIGHER FARE THE DIFFERENCE WILL BE COLLECTED AND THE CHANGE FEE WILL BE APPLIED ------------------------------------------------- DOWNGRADE IS PERMITTED ONLY FROM/TO NORMAL FARES. REFUND RESIDUAL VALUE OR ISSUE AN EMD FOR TRANSPORTATION ------------------------------------------------- WHEN THIS FARE IS COMBINED WITH ANOTHER FARE AND ONLY ONE FARE COMPONENT IS CHANGED THE PENALTY CONDITIONS OF THE CHANGED FARE COMPONENT WILL APPLY. WHEN MORE THAN ONE FARE COMPONENT IS BEING CHANGED THE SUM OF THE PENALTY OF ALL CHANGED FARE COMPONENTS WILL APPLY ------------------------------------------------- B-AFTER DEPARTURE THE ITINERARY MUST BE RE-PRICED USING HISTORICAL FARES IN EFFECT ON THE PREVIOUS TICKETING DATE THE NEW  ITINERARY MUST MEET ALL THE RULE PROVISIONS OF THE NEWLY TICKETED FARES SUCH THAT THE RECALCULATED FARE COULD HAVE BEEN USED FOR THE NEW ITINERARY IF PURCHASED ON THE ORIGINAL TICKET ISSUE DATE -----------------------------------------------

rules_general_info:
RU.RULE APPLICATION RESTRICTED ONE WAY AND ROUND TRIP PC FARES APPLICATION CLASS OF SERVICE THESE FARES APPLY FOR ECONOMY CLASS SERVICE. TYPES OF TRANSPORTATION FARES GOVERNED BY THIS RULE CAN BE USED TO CREATE ONE-WAY/ROUND-TRIP/OPEN-JAW JOURNEYS. SE.SEASONS FOR QOWBYD1W TYPE FARES 
PERMITTED 29OCT 23 THROUGH 30MAR 24 FOR EACH TRIP. SR.SALES RESTRICT 
TICKETS MUST BE ISSUED ON PC  AND MAY NOT BE SOLD IN EGYPT AND MAY ONLY BE SOLD IN AREA 1/AREA 2/AREA 3 AP.ADVANCE RES/TKT 
RESERVATIONS FOR ALL SECTORS ARE REQUIRED AT LEAST 75 MINUTES BEFORE DEPARTURE. TICKETING MUST BE COMPLETED THE DAY RESERVATIONS ARE MADE. FL.FLT APPLICATION FOR FARES VIA RTG100 
THE FARE COMPONENT MUST NOT BE ON ONE OR MORE OF THE FOLLOWING PC FLIGHTS 7500 THROUGH 7999. AND THE FARE COMPONENT MUST BE ON ONE OR MORE OF THE FOLLOWING ANY PC FLIGHT OPERATED BY PC BUT NOT ON DIRECT FLIGHTS. CD.CHILD DISCOUNTS FOR ONE WAY FARES 
ACCOMPANIED CHILD 2-11 - NO DISCOUNT OR - UNACCOMPANIED CHILD 8-11 - NO DISCOUNT OR - INFANT UNDER 2 WITHOUT A SEAT - CHARGE USD 46.00. MUST BE ACCOMPANIED ON ALL FLIGHTS IN SAME COMPARTMENT BY ADULT. SO.STOPOVERS 
2 STOPOVERS PERMITTED ON THE PRICING UNIT LIMITED TO 1 FREE AND 1 AT EUR 50.00. 1 FREE IN TURKEY/FRU 1 IN TURKEY/FRU AT EUR 50.00. A STOPOVER MAY NOT EXCEED 24 HOURS. TF.TRANSFERS/RTGS 
4 FREE TRANSFERS PERMITTED ON THE PRICING UNIT - 2 IN EACH DIRECTION FREE IN TURKEY FREE IN ITALY FARE BREAK AND EMBEDDED SURFACE SECTORS NOT PERMITTED ON THE FARE COMPONENT. SU.SURCHARGES FOR QOWBYD1W TYPE FARES 
THE PROVISIONS BELOW APPLY ONLY AS FOLLOWS - RESERVATIONS ARE REQUIRED AT LEAST 60 DAYS BEFORE DEPARTURE. OPEN RETURNS NOT PERMITTED. THERE IS NO CHARGE FOR TRAVEL PER DIRECTION. 
THE PROVISIONS BELOW APPLY ONLY AS FOLLOWS - RESERVATIONS ARE REQUIRED AT LEAST 10 DAYS BEFORE DEPARTURE. OPEN RETURNS NOT PERMITTED. A SURCHARGE OF EUR 6.60 PER DIRECTION WILL BE ADDED TO THE APPLICABLE FARE FOR TRAVEL. 
THE PROVISIONS BELOW APPLY ONLY AS FOLLOWS - RESERVATIONS ARE REQUIRED AT LEAST 24 HOURS BEFORE DEPARTURE. OPEN RETURNS NOT PERMITTED. RESERVATIONS AND TICKETING MUST BE COMPLETED AT THE SAME TIME. A SURCHARGE OF EUR 10.00 PER DIRECTION WILL BE ADDED TO THE APPLICABLE FARE FOR TRAVEL. 
THE PROVISIONS BELOW APPLY ONLY AS FOLLOWS - RESERVATIONS ARE REQUIRED AT LEAST 6 HOURS BEFORE DEPARTURE. OPEN RETURNS NOT PERMITTED. RESERVATIONS AND TICKETING MUST BE COMPLETED AT THE SAME TIME. A SURCHARGE OF EUR 10.00 PER DIRECTION WILL BE ADDED TO THE APPLICABLE FARE FOR TRAVEL. AND - A SURCHARGE OF 10 PERCENT OF THE FARE PER DIRECTION WILL BE ADDED TO THE APPLICABLE FARE FOR TRAVEL. 
OTHERWISE A SURCHARGE OF EUR 10.00 PER DIRECTION WILL BE ADDED TO THE APPLICABLE FARE FOR TRAVEL. AND - A SURCHARGE OF 15 PERCENT OF THE FARE PER DIRECTION WILL BE ADDED TO THE APPLICABLE FARE FOR TRAVEL. CO.COMBINABILITY FOR ONE WAY FARES CIRCLE TRIPS NOT PERMITTED. END-ON-END NOT PERMITTED. SIDE TRIPS NOT PERMITTED APPLICABLE ADD-ON CONSTRUCTION IS ADDRESSED IN MISCELLANEOUS PROVISIONS - CATEGORY 23. OPEN JAWS/ROUND TRIPS FARES MAY BE COMBINED ON A HALF ROUND TRIP BASIS -TO FORM SINGLE OR DOUBLE OPEN JAWS. A MAXIMUM OF TWO INTERNATIONAL FARE COMPONENTS PERMITTED. THE MILEAGE FOR AN INTERNATIONAL OPEN SEGMENT IS EQUAL TO OR LESS THAN THE MILEAGE FOR THE SHORTEST FLOWN FARE COMPONENT. THERE IS NO MILEAGE RESTRICTION ON AN OPEN SEGMENT WITHIN ONE COUNTRY. -TO FORM ROUND TRIPS PROVIDED - COMBINATIONS ARE WITH ANY FARE FOR CARRIER PC/ZM IN ANY RULE AND TARIFF. HI.HIGHER INTERMEDIATE POINT 
AREA 2/AREA 3 ARE EXCLUDED FROM THE HIGHER INTERMEDIATE POINT RULE. VC.VOLUNTARY CHANGES VOLUNTARY CHANGES CONDITIONS MAY APPLY FOR AUTOMATED REISSUE/REVALIDATION REFER TO PENALTIES CATEGORY *PE FOR DETAILS 
VR.VOLUNTARY REFUNDS VOLUNTARY CHANGES CONDITIONS MAY APPLY FOR AUTOMATED REFUNDS REFER TO PENALTIES CATEGORY *PE FOR DETAILS
rules_ticket_endorsment:
TE.TKT ENDORSEMENT 
THE ORIGINAL AND THE REISSUED TICKET MUST BE ANNOTATED - NONEND/PC ONLY - IN THE ENDORSEMENT BOX.
rules_penalties:
PE.PENALTIES 
CHANGES 
ANY TIME TICKET IS NON-REFUNDABLE. CHANGES NOT PERMITTED IN CASE OF REISSUE. NOTE - NO CHNG PERMTTED. -- IF OUTBOUND NO SHOW NO CHANGE PERMITTED. NEW OW MUST BE ISSUED. INBOUND CAN BE CHANGED ACCORDING TO THE FARE RULES. -- CHANGES CAN BE PERFORMED TO THE SAME RBD OR TO A HIGHER RBD. NO REFUND OF ANY RESIDUAL VALUE APPLICABLE. -- WHERE THIS FARE IS COMBINED WITH ANOTHER FARE AND ONLY ONE FARE COMPONENT IS CHANGED  THE PENALTY CONDITIONS OF THE CHANGED FARE COMPONENT WILL APPLY WHEN MORE THAN ONE FARE COMPONENT IS CHANGED THEN THE SUM OF THE PENALTY OF ALL CHANGED FARE COMPONENTS WILL APPLY. -- CHANGE FEE MUST BE COLLECTED AS CP TAX. -- CHANGES PERMITTED FOR REROUTING/REBOOKING PROVIDED THE FOLLOWING CONDITIONS ARE COMPLIED WITH- REROUTING/REBOOKING PERMITTED PROVIDED ALL CONDITIONS OF THE NEW FARE INCLUDING ADVANCE PURCHASE AND COMBINABILITY ARE COMPLIED WITH IRRESPECTIVE IF CHANGE OCCURS TO OUTBOUND OR INBOUND FLIGHT. WHEN THE NEW ITINERARY RESULTS IN A HIGHER FARE THE DIFFERENCE WILL BE COLLECTED - AND - THE CHANGE FEE WILL BE APPLIED. WHEN THE NEW ITINERARY RESULTS IN A LOWER FARE NO RESIDUAL AMOUNT WILL BE MADE - AND - THE CHANGE FEE WILL BE APPLIED. 
CANCELLATIONS 
ANY TIME TICKET IS NON-REFUNDABLE. NOTE - TICKET IS NON REFUNDABLE IN CASE OF NOSHOW/CANCEL/REFUND -- YQ SURCHARGE IS NON REFUNDABLE YR SURCHARGE IS NON REFUNDABLE -- CHARGES SHALL NOT BE WAIVED FOR MEDICAL REASONS 
TICKET IS NON-REFUNDABLE IN CASE OF NO-SHOW. NOTE - YQ SURCHARGE IS NON REFUNDABLE YR SURCHARGE IS NON REFUNDABLE IN CASE OF NO-SHOW AIRPORT TAXES ARE REFUNDABLE IF THE REFUND REQUEST SHALL BE DONE ONLY BY OUR GUESTS DIRECTLY THROUGH FLYPGS.COM-EXCEPT POINT OF SALE ISRAEL

PERMITTED 29OCT 23 THROUGH 30MAR 24 FOR EACH TRIP. SR.SALES RESTRICT

rules_general_info:
RU.RULE APPLICATION FOR WRJSPQA1 TYPE FARES SUPER/SPECIAL INSTANT PURCHASE FARES APPLICATION AREA THESE FARES APPLY FROM EUROPE TO JORDAN. CLASS OF SERVICE THESE FARES APPLY FOR ECONOMY CLASS SERVICE. TYPES OF TRANSPORTATION THIS RULE GOVERNS ROUND-TRIP FARES. FARES GOVERNED BY THIS RULE CAN BE USED TO CREATE ROUND-TRIP/OPEN-JAW JOURNEYS. CAPACITY LIMITATIONS THE CARRIER SHALL LIMIT THE NUMBER OF PASSENGERS CARRIED ON ANY ONE FLIGHT AT FARES GOVERNED BY THIS RULE AND SUCH FARES WILL NOT NECESSARILY BE AVAILABLE ON ALL FLIGHTS. THE NUMBER OF SEATS WHICH THE CARRIER SHALL MAKE AVAILABLE ON A GIVEN FLIGHT WILL BE DETERMINED BY THE CARRIERS BEST JUDGMENT MN.MIN STAY FOR WRJSPQA1 TYPE FARES 
TRAVEL FROM LAST STOPOVER MUST COMMENCE NO EARLIER THAN 3 DAYS AFTER DEPARTURE FROM FARE ORIGIN. MX.MAX STAY BETWEEN DOH AND EUROPE FOR WRJSPQA1 TYPE FARES 
TRAVEL FROM LAST STOPOVER MUST COMMENCE NO LATER THAN 1 MONTH AFTER DEPARTURE FROM FARE ORIGIN. BO.BLACKOUTS 
OUTBOUND - TRAVEL IS NOT PERMITTED 17DEC THROUGH 24DEC. 
INBOUND - TRAVEL IS NOT PERMITTED 31DEC THROUGH 07JAN OF THE NEXT YEAR. SR.SALES RESTRICT 
TICKETS MUST BE ISSUED ON/BEFORE 04DEC 23. FOR WRJSPQA1 TYPE FARES 
TICKETS MUST BE ISSUED ON RJ  AND MAY NOT BE SOLD IN YEMEN, REPUBLIC OF/LIBYAN ARAB JAMAHIRIYA/SUDAN *** GENERAL RULE FOLLOWS *** 
TICKETS MAY NOT BE SOLD IN RUSSIA/EGYPT. TR.TVL RESTRICTION 
VALID FOR TRAVEL COMMENCING ON/BEFORE 31MAR 24. AP.ADVANCE RES/TKT FOR WRJSPQA1 TYPE FARES 
RESERVATIONS FOR ALL SECTORS AND TICKETING ARE REQUIRED AT LEAST 3 DAYS BEFORE DEPARTURE. WAITLIST NOT PERMITTED. NOTE - -- GENERAL RULE -- RJ RESERVES THE RIGHT TO CANCEL ANY PNR WHERE ITINERARY DO NOT COMPLY WITH THE RESERVATION BOOKING CODE / RBD/ ----- IF THE COUPONS ARE NOT USED IN THE SEQUENCE PROVIDED IN THE TICKET RJ RESERVES THE RIGHT TO CHARGE THE HIGHER FARE IF ANY. FAILING WHICH RJ WILL CANCELL ANY PNR OR INVALIDATE THE REMAINING RJ SECTOR. ----- IF A PASSENGER FAILS TO TRAVEL ON A SECTOR BOOKED RJ RESERVES THE RIGHT TO CANCEL THE REMAINING RJ SECTOR . ----- ALL FARES ARE SUBJECT TO CHANGE OR WITHDRAWAL WITHOUT NOTICE. FARES ARE ONLY GUARANTEED IF AUTO-PRICED AND TICKETED IN GDS ON THE SAME DAY. ----- PASSENGERS WHO CHECK-IN OUT OF AMM AND FAIL TO PROCEED TO THE BOARDING GATE AT THE AIRPORT ON TIME RJ HOLD THE RIGHT TO UPLIFT THE CHECKED IN SECTOR AND HE/SHE NEEDS TO PURCHASE A NEW TICKET FOR THIS JOURNEY. ----- THE APPLICABLE ENTRY IN AMADEUS TO ACCESS RJ INFORMATION  PAGES IS / GGAIRRJ ---------- *** GENERAL RULE FOLLOWS *** 
NOTE - RJ RESERVES THE RIGHT TO CANCEL ANY PNR WHERE ITINERARIES DO NOT COMPLY WITH RESERVATION BOOKING CODE /RBD/. -------- IF THE FLIGHT COUPONS ARE NOT USED IN THE SEQUENCE PROVIDED IN THE TICKET RJ RESERVES THE RIGHT TO CHARGE THE HIGHER CORRECT FARE. IF ANY FAILING RJ WILL CANCEL ANY PNR OR INVALIDATE THE REMAINING FLIGHT COUPONS. -------- IF A PASSENGER FAILS TO TRAVEL ON A SECTOR BOOKED RJ RESERVES THE RIGHT TO CANCEL THE REMAINING RJ SECTORS. -------- ALL FARES ARE SUBJECT TO CHANGE OR WITHDRAWAL WITHOUT NOTICE. FARES ARE ONLY GUARANTEED IF AUTO-PRICED . ------------ PASSENGERS WHO CHECK-IN OUT OF AMM AND FAIL TO PROCEED TO THE BOARDING GATE AT THE AIRPORT ON TIME RJ HOLD THE RIGHT TO UPLIFT THE CHECKED IN SECTOR AND HE/SHE NEEDS TO PURCHASE A NEW TICKET FOR THIS JOURNEY. ------------- FL.FLT APPLICATION BETWEEN EUROPE AND MIDDLE EAST 
THE FARE COMPONENT MUST NOT BE ON ONE OR MORE OF THE FOLLOWING RJ FLIGHTS 3000 THROUGH 3999 RJ FLIGHTS 4000 THROUGH 4999 RJ FLIGHTS 7000 THROUGH 7999. AND THE FARE COMPONENT MUST INCLUDE TRAVEL VIA AMM ON ONE OR MORE OF THE FOLLOWING ANY RJ FLIGHT. CD.CHILD DISCOUNTS 
ACCOMPANIED CHILD 2-11 - CHARGE 75 PERCENT OF THE FARE. TICKETING CODE - BASE FARE CODE PLUS CH OR - INFANT UNDER 2 WITH A SEAT - CHARGE 75 PERCENT OF THE FARE OR - UNACCOMPANIED CHILD 6-11 - CHARGE 75 PERCENT OF THE FARE OR - UNACCOMPANIED CHILD 2-5 - CHARGE 75 PERCENT OF THE FARE. NOTE - MUST BE ACCOMPANIED BY AN ESCORT FROM THE AIRLINE /RJ/ OR - INFANT UNDER 2 WITHOUT A SEAT - CHARGE 10 PERCENT OF THE FARE. TICKETING CODE - BASE FARE CODE PLUS IN. TC.TOUR CONDUCTOR 
TOUR CONDUCTOR - NO DISCOUNT. AD.AGTS DISCOUNTS 
AGENT - NO DISCOUNT. OD.OTHER DISCOUNTS 
NOTE - ID-N1/N2 AD-N1/N2 DG-G1/G2 DISCOUNT NOT APPLICABLE SO.STOPOVERS BETWEEN DOH AND EUROPE FOR WRJSPQA1 TYPE FARES 
2 STOPOVERS PERMITTED ON THE PRICING UNIT - 1 IN EACH DIRECTION IN AMM AT QAR 130 EACH. TF.TRANSFERS/RTGS BETWEEN EUROPE AND MIDDLE EAST 
UNLIMITED TRANSFERS PERMITTED ON THE PRICING UNIT FARE BREAK SURFACE SECTORS PERMITTED AND EMBEDDED SURFACE SECTORS NOT PERMITTED ON THE FARE COMPONENT. NOTE - AS PER ROUTING MAP SU.SURCHARGES BETWEEN EUROPE AND MIDDLE EAST 
IF INFANT UNDER 02 WITHOUT A SEAT. THERE IS NO FUEL SURCHARGE. 
THE PROVISIONS BELOW APPLY ONLY AS FOLLOWS - TICKETS MUST BE ISSUED ON RJ . THERE IS NO FUEL SURCHARGE. 
OTHERWISE A FUEL SURCHARGE OF USD 188.00 PER DIRECTION WILL BE ADDED TO THE APPLICABLE FARE. NOTE - CHILD DISCOUNT AND ID/DG DISCOUNT DOES NOT APPLY. CO.COMBINABILITY FOR ONE WAY FARES SINGLE/DOUBLE OPEN JAWS/ROUND TRIPS/CIRCLE TRIPS NOT PERMITTED. APPLICABLE ADD-ON CONSTRUCTION IS ADDRESSED IN MISCELLANEOUS PROVISIONS - CATEGORY 23. END-ON-END END-ON-END COMBINATIONS PERMITTED WITH DOMESTIC FARES BETWEEN AMM AND AQJ. VALIDATE ALL FARE COMPONENTS. FARES MUST BE SHOWN SEPARATELY ON THE TICKET. TRAVEL MUST BE VIA THE POINT OF COMBINATION. SIDE TRIPS PERMITTED. END-ON-END COMBINATIONS PERMITTED WITH RJ  INTERNATIONAL FARES. VALIDATE ALL FARE COMPONENTS. FARES MUST BE SHOWN SEPARATELY ON THE TICKET. SIDE TRIPS PERMITTED. HI.HIGHER INTERMEDIATE POINT 
THE HIGHER INTERMEDIATE POINT RULE DOES NOT APPLY FOR STOPOVERS. NOTE - THE HIP RULE DOES NOT APPLY. THESE FARES SHOULD NOT BE COMPARED OR CHECKED WITH FOR THE FOLLOWING- HIGHER INTERMEDIATE FARES           /HIP/ DIRECT MINIMUM CHECK                /DMC/ COUNTRY OF PAYMENT MINIMUM CHECK    /COP/ CIRCLE TRIP MINIMUM CHECK           /CTM/ OW SUB-JOURNEY CHECK                /OSC/ RT SUB-JOURNEY CHECK                /RSC/ MD.MISCELLANEOUS DATA 
THIS FARE MUST NOT BE USED AS THE HIGH OR THE LOW FARE WHEN CALCULATING A DIFFERENTIAL. THIS FARE MUST NOT BE USED AS THE THROUGH FARE WHEN PRICING A FARE COMPONENT WITH A DIFFERENTIAL. VC.VOLUNTARY CHANGES VOLUNTARY CHANGES CONDITIONS MAY APPLY FOR AUTOMATED REISSUE/REVALIDATION REFER TO PENALTIES CATEGORY *PE FOR DETAILS 
VR.VOLUNTARY REFUNDS VOLUNTARY CHANGES CONDITIONS MAY APPLY FOR AUTOMATED REFUNDS REFER TO PENALTIES CATEGORY *PE FOR DETAILS
rules_ticket_endorsment:
TE.TKT ENDORSEMENT 
THE ORIGINAL AND THE REISSUED TICKET MUST BE ANNOTATED - HOTAC NOT INCLUD FORTRANST - IN THE ENDORSEMENT BOX.
rules_penalties:
PE.PENALTIES BETWEEN DOH AND EUROPE FOR WRJSPQA1 TYPE FARES 
CANCELLATIONS 
ANY TIME TICKET IS NON-REFUNDABLE. NOTE - REFUND OF UNUSED FEES AND TAXES PERMITTED EXCEPT FOR THE YR/YQ ARE NON REFUNDABLE 
CHANGES 
CHARGE QAR 650 FOR NO-SHOW. NOTE - IN CASE OF NO-SHOW ONLY ONE FEE IS TO BE CHARGED. I.E EITHER THE NO-SHOW FEE OR THE REISSUE/REVALIDATION FEE WHICHEVER IS HIGHER 
ANY TIME CHARGE QAR 325 FOR REISSUE/REVALIDATION. CHILD/INFANT DISCOUNTS APPLY. NOTE - TICKETS MAY BE UPGRADED TO ANY HIGHER FARE OR CABIN FOR THE CHANGED UNUSED SECTOR PROVIDED QAR 325 IS COLLECTED PLUS ANY DIFFERENCE IN FARE .ATC MAY NOT HANDLE *** GENERAL RULE FOLLOWS *** FROM/TO DOH FOR WRJSPQA1 TYPE FARES 
ORIGINATING DOH - FOR TICKETING ON/AFTER 01NOV 23 AND ON/BEFORE 31MAY 24/ FOR TRAVEL ON/AFTER 01NOV 23 AND ON/BEFORE 31MAY 24 CHANGES 
CHANGES PERMITTED FOR REISSUE/REVALIDATION. NOTE - FIRST CHANGE FREE OF COST. ANY ADDITIONAL CHANGES PENALTY SHOULD BE COLLECTED AS MENTIONED ABOVE. ATC CANNOT READ IF THIS  IS FIRST OR SECOND CHANGE SO PLEASE CHECK PNR HISTORICAL DATA AND ACT ACCORDINGLY. ----------------------------------------------- YQ TAX IS NON-REFUNDABLE IN ALL CASES. -------------------------------------------- CALL CENTER SERVICE FEES MAY APPLY UPON REVALIDATION/REISSUANCE ------------------------------------------- SOME TAXES ARE NON REF CHECK TAX RULES -------------------------------------------- PASSENGER WILL BE TREATED AS NO SHOW IF THE BOOKING IS NOT CANCELLED AT LEAST 4 HOURS BEFORE THE DEPARTURE OF THE FLIGHT .

THIS FARE MUST NOT BE USED AS THE HIGH OR THE LOW FARE WHEN CALCULATING A DIFFERENTIAL. THIS FARE MUST NOT BE USED AS THE THROUGH FARE WHEN PRICING A FARE COMPONENT WITH A DIFFERENTIAL. rules_penalties:
PE.PENALTIES BETWEEN DOH AND EUROPE FOR WRJSPQA1 TYPE FARES 
CANCELLATIONS 
ANY TIME TICKET IS NON-REFUNDABLE. NOTE - REFUND OF UNUSED FEES AND TAXES PERMITTED EXCEPT FOR THE YR/YQ ARE NON REFUNDABLE 
CHANGES 
CHARGE QAR 650 FOR NO-SHOW. NOTE - IN CASE OF NO-SHOW ONLY ONE FEE IS TO BE CHARGED. I.E EITHER THE NO-SHOW FEE OR THE REISSUE/REVALIDATION FEE WHICHEVER IS HIGHER 
ANY TIME CHARGE QAR 325 FOR REISSUE/REVALIDATION. CHILD/INFANT DISCOUNTS APPLY. NOTE - TICKETS MAY BE UPGRADED TO ANY HIGHER FARE OR CABIN FOR THE CHANGED UNUSED SECTOR PROVIDED QAR 325 IS COLLECTED PLUS ANY DIFFERENCE IN FARE .ATC MAY NOT HANDLE *** GENERAL RULE FOLLOWS *** FROM/TO DOH FOR WRJSPQA1 TYPE FARES 
ORIGINATING DOH - FOR TICKETING ON/AFTER 01NOV 23 AND ON/BEFORE 31MAY 24/ FOR TRAVEL ON/AFTER 01NOV 23 AND ON/BEFORE 31MAY 24 CHANGES 
CHANGES PERMITTED FOR REISSUE/REVALIDATION. NOTE - FIRST CHANGE FREE OF COST. ANY ADDITIONAL CHANGES PENALTY SHOULD BE COLLECTED AS MENTIONED ABOVE. ATC CANNOT READ IF THIS  IS FIRST OR SECOND CHANGE SO PLEASE CHECK PNR HISTORICAL DATA AND ACT ACCORDINGLY. ----------------------------------------------- YQ TAX IS NON-REFUNDABLE IN ALL CASES. -------------------------------------------- CALL CENTER SERVICE FEES MAY APPLY UPON REVALIDATION/REISSUANCE ------------------------------------------- SOME TAXES ARE NON REF CHECK TAX RULES -------------------------------------------- PASSENGER WILL BE TREATED AS NO SHOW IF THE BOOKING IS NOT CANCELLED AT LEAST 4 HOURS BEFORE THE DEPARTURE OF THE FLIGHT .

rules_general_info:
RU.RULE APPLICATION FOR WRJSPQA1 TYPE FARES SUPER/SPECIAL INSTANT PURCHASE FARES APPLICATION AREA THESE FARES APPLY FROM EUROPE TO JORDAN. CLASS OF SERVICE THESE FARES APPLY FOR ECONOMY CLASS SERVICE. TYPES OF TRANSPORTATION THIS RULE GOVERNS ROUND-TRIP FARES. FARES GOVERNED BY THIS RULE CAN BE USED TO CREATE ROUND-TRIP/OPEN-JAW JOURNEYS. CAPACITY LIMITATIONS THE CARRIER SHALL LIMIT THE NUMBER OF PASSENGERS CARRIED ON ANY ONE FLIGHT AT FARES GOVERNED BY THIS RULE AND SUCH FARES WILL NOT NECESSARILY BE AVAILABLE ON ALL FLIGHTS. THE NUMBER OF SEATS WHICH THE CARRIER SHALL MAKE AVAILABLE ON A GIVEN FLIGHT WILL BE DETERMINED BY THE CARRIERS BEST JUDGMENT MN.MIN STAY FOR WRJSPQA1 TYPE FARES 
TRAVEL FROM LAST STOPOVER MUST COMMENCE NO EARLIER THAN 3 DAYS AFTER DEPARTURE FROM FARE ORIGIN. MX.MAX STAY BETWEEN DOH AND EUROPE FOR WRJSPQA1 TYPE FARES 
TRAVEL FROM LAST STOPOVER MUST COMMENCE NO LATER THAN 1 MONTH AFTER DEPARTURE FROM FARE ORIGIN. BO.BLACKOUTS 
OUTBOUND - TRAVEL IS NOT PERMITTED 17DEC THROUGH 24DEC. 
INBOUND - TRAVEL IS NOT PERMITTED 31DEC THROUGH 07JAN OF THE NEXT YEAR. SR.SALES RESTRICT 
TICKETS MUST BE ISSUED ON/BEFORE 04DEC 23. FOR WRJSPQA1 TYPE FARES 
TICKETS MUST BE ISSUED ON RJ  AND MAY NOT BE SOLD IN YEMEN, REPUBLIC OF/LIBYAN ARAB JAMAHIRIYA/SUDAN *** GENERAL RULE FOLLOWS *** 
TICKETS MAY NOT BE SOLD IN RUSSIA/EGYPT. TR.TVL RESTRICTION 
VALID FOR TRAVEL COMMENCING ON/BEFORE 31MAR 24. AP.ADVANCE RES/TKT FOR WRJSPQA1 TYPE FARES 
RESERVATIONS FOR ALL SECTORS AND TICKETING ARE REQUIRED AT LEAST 3 DAYS BEFORE DEPARTURE. WAITLIST NOT PERMITTED. NOTE - -- GENERAL RULE -- RJ RESERVES THE RIGHT TO CANCEL ANY PNR WHERE ITINERARY DO NOT COMPLY WITH THE RESERVATION BOOKING CODE / RBD/ ----- IF THE COUPONS ARE NOT USED IN THE SEQUENCE PROVIDED IN THE TICKET RJ RESERVES THE RIGHT TO CHARGE THE HIGHER FARE IF ANY. FAILING WHICH RJ WILL CANCELL ANY PNR OR INVALIDATE THE REMAINING RJ SECTOR. ----- IF A PASSENGER FAILS TO TRAVEL ON A SECTOR BOOKED RJ RESERVES THE RIGHT TO CANCEL THE REMAINING RJ SECTOR . ----- ALL FARES ARE SUBJECT TO CHANGE OR WITHDRAWAL WITHOUT NOTICE. FARES ARE ONLY GUARANTEED IF AUTO-PRICED AND TICKETED IN GDS ON THE SAME DAY. ----- PASSENGERS WHO CHECK-IN OUT OF AMM AND FAIL TO PROCEED TO THE BOARDING GATE AT THE AIRPORT ON TIME RJ HOLD THE RIGHT TO UPLIFT THE CHECKED IN SECTOR AND HE/SHE NEEDS TO PURCHASE A NEW TICKET FOR THIS JOURNEY. ----- THE APPLICABLE ENTRY IN AMADEUS TO ACCESS RJ INFORMATION  PAGES IS / GGAIRRJ ---------- *** GENERAL RULE FOLLOWS *** 
NOTE - RJ RESERVES THE RIGHT TO CANCEL ANY PNR WHERE ITINERARIES DO NOT COMPLY WITH RESERVATION BOOKING CODE /RBD/. -------- IF THE FLIGHT COUPONS ARE NOT USED IN THE SEQUENCE PROVIDED IN THE TICKET RJ RESERVES THE RIGHT TO CHARGE THE HIGHER CORRECT FARE. IF ANY FAILING RJ WILL CANCEL ANY PNR OR INVALIDATE THE REMAINING FLIGHT COUPONS. -------- IF A PASSENGER FAILS TO TRAVEL ON A SECTOR BOOKED RJ RESERVES THE RIGHT TO CANCEL THE REMAINING RJ SECTORS. -------- ALL FARES ARE SUBJECT TO CHANGE OR WITHDRAWAL WITHOUT NOTICE. FARES ARE ONLY GUARANTEED IF AUTO-PRICED . ------------ PASSENGERS WHO CHECK-IN OUT OF AMM AND FAIL TO PROCEED TO THE BOARDING GATE AT THE AIRPORT ON TIME RJ HOLD THE RIGHT TO UPLIFT THE CHECKED IN SECTOR AND HE/SHE NEEDS TO PURCHASE A NEW TICKET FOR THIS JOURNEY. ------------- FL.FLT APPLICATION BETWEEN EUROPE AND MIDDLE EAST 
THE FARE COMPONENT MUST NOT BE ON ONE OR MORE OF THE FOLLOWING RJ FLIGHTS 3000 THROUGH 3999 RJ FLIGHTS 4000 THROUGH 4999 RJ FLIGHTS 7000 THROUGH 7999. AND THE FARE COMPONENT MUST INCLUDE TRAVEL VIA AMM ON ONE OR MORE OF THE FOLLOWING ANY RJ FLIGHT. CD.CHILD DISCOUNTS 
ACCOMPANIED CHILD 2-11 - CHARGE 75 PERCENT OF THE FARE. TICKETING CODE - BASE FARE CODE PLUS CH OR - INFANT UNDER 2 WITH A SEAT - CHARGE 75 PERCENT OF THE FARE OR - UNACCOMPANIED CHILD 6-11 - CHARGE 75 PERCENT OF THE FARE OR - UNACCOMPANIED CHILD 2-5 - CHARGE 75 PERCENT OF THE FARE. NOTE - MUST BE ACCOMPANIED BY AN ESCORT FROM THE AIRLINE /RJ/ OR - INFANT UNDER 2 WITHOUT A SEAT - CHARGE 10 PERCENT OF THE FARE. TICKETING CODE - BASE FARE CODE PLUS IN. TC.TOUR CONDUCTOR 
TOUR CONDUCTOR - NO DISCOUNT. AD.AGTS DISCOUNTS 
AGENT - NO DISCOUNT. OD.OTHER DISCOUNTS 
NOTE - ID-N1/N2 AD-N1/N2 DG-G1/G2 DISCOUNT NOT APPLICABLE SO.STOPOVERS BETWEEN DOH AND EUROPE FOR WRJSPQA1 TYPE FARES 
2 STOPOVERS PERMITTED ON THE PRICING UNIT - 1 IN EACH DIRECTION IN AMM AT QAR 130 EACH. TF.TRANSFERS/RTGS BETWEEN EUROPE AND MIDDLE EAST 
UNLIMITED TRANSFERS PERMITTED ON THE PRICING UNIT FARE BREAK SURFACE SECTORS PERMITTED AND EMBEDDED SURFACE SECTORS NOT PERMITTED ON THE FARE COMPONENT. NOTE - AS PER ROUTING MAP SU.SURCHARGES BETWEEN EUROPE AND MIDDLE EAST

rules_general_info:
RU.RULE APPLICATION BETWEEN MIDDLE EAST AND EGYPT MS ONE WAY INSTANT PURCHASE FARES FROM MIDDLE EAST TO EGYPT APPLICATION AREA THESE FARES APPLY FROM MIDDLE EAST TO EGYPT. CLASS OF SERVICE THESE FARES APPLY FOR ECONOMY CLASS SERVICE. TYPES OF TRANSPORTATION FARES GOVERNED BY THIS RULE CAN BE USED TO CREATE ONE-WAY JOURNEYS. FARES ONLY APPLY IF PURCHASED BEFORE DEPARTURE. EXCEPTION-CAN BE USED FOR EN-ROUTE UP-GRADING FROM LOWER FARE. CAPACITY LIMITATIONS THE CARRIER SHALL LIMIT THE NUMBER OF PASSENGERS CARRIED ON ANY ONE FLIGHT AT FARES GOVERNED BY THIS RULE AND SUCH FARES WILL NOT NECESSARILY BE AVAILABLE ON ALL FLIGHTS. THE NUMBER OF SEATS WHICH THE CARRIER SHALL MAKE AVAILABLE ON A GIVEN FLIGHT WILL BE DETERMINED BY THE CARRIERS BEST JUDGMENT OTHER CONDITIONS PASSENGER EXPENSES NOT PERMITTED. SE.SEASONS BETWEEN DOH AND EGYPT FOR BASIC SEASON FARES 
PERMITTED 01JUL THROUGH 14JUN. SR.SALES RESTRICT 
TICKETS MUST BE ISSUED ON MS . OR - TICKETS MUST BE ISSUED ON MS . OR - TICKETS MUST BE ISSUED ON MS  OR HR. *** GENERAL RULE FOLLOWS *** 
TICKETS MAY NOT BE SOLD IN ERITREA/NIGERIA/COTE D'IVOIRE. TICKETS MAY ONLY BE SOLD IN AREA 1/AREA 2/AREA 3. TR.TVL RESTRICTION 
VALID FOR TRAVEL COMMENCING ON/AFTER 01APR 22. AP.ADVANCE RES/TKT 
RESERVATIONS ARE REQUIRED FOR ALL SECTORS. NOTE - WARNING IF PASSENGER FAILED TO TRAVEL -NOSHOW- ON A BOOKED SECTOR MS RESERVES THE RIGHT TO CANCEL ALL MS REMAINING SECTORS. FL.FLT APPLICATION FROM/TO MIDDLE EAST 
THE FARE COMPONENT MUST BE ON ONE OR MORE OF THE FOLLOWING ANY MS FLIGHT OPERATED BY MS. CD.CHILD DISCOUNTS BETWEEN DOH AND CAI 
ACCOMPANIED CHILD 2-11 - CHARGE 75 PERCENT OF THE FARE. TICKET DESIGNATOR - CH AND PERCENT OF DISCOUNT OR - UNACCOMPANIED CHILD 2-11 - CHARGE 100 PERCENT OF THE FARE. TICKET DESIGNATOR - UM. NOTE - UM UNDER 2 YEARS WILL NOT BE ACCEPTED FOR CARRIAGE - MINORS BETWEEN 2 AND 5 WILL BE ACCEPTED FOR UNAC COMPANIED TRANSPORTATION EXCEPTIONALLY ONLY AND THIS WILL NECESSITATE ASSIGNMENT OF AN EXTRA HOSTE SS. APPLICABLE ONEWAY MS FARES FOR THE SECTOR ON WHICH EXTRA HOSTESS TRAVELS WITH THE UM WILL B E CHARGED. --- AGE 5 MEANS UNTIL UM REACHES HIS/HER 6TH BIRTHDAY. OR - 1ST INFANT UNDER 2 WITHOUT A SEAT - CHARGE 10 PERCENT OF THE FARE. TICKET DESIGNATOR - IN AND PERCENT OF DISCOUNT OR - INFANT UNDER 2 WITH A SEAT - CHARGE 75 PERCENT OF THE FARE. TICKET DESIGNATOR - CH AND PERCENT OF DISCOUNT. 
INBOUND - IF TRAVEL COMMENCES ON EACH TRIP ON/BEFORE 15MAR 23 OR - TRAVEL COMMENCES ON EACH TRIP ON/AFTER 19MAR 23 AND ON/BEFORE 22MAR 23 OR - TRAVEL COMMENCES ON EACH TRIP ON/AFTER 28MAR 23 AND ON/BEFORE 31MAR 23 OR - TRAVEL COMMENCES ON EACH TRIP ON/AFTER 09JUL 23 AND ON/BEFORE 26JUL 23 OR - TRAVEL COMMENCES ON EACH TRIP ON/AFTER 17SEP 23 AND ON/BEFORE 30SEP 23

rules_penalties:
PE.PENALTIES FROM/TO QATAR FOR SLRIMSO TYPE FARES 
CANCELLATIONS 
ANY TIME CHARGE USD 50.00 FOR CANCEL/REFUND. WAIVED FOR DEATH OF PASSENGER OR FAMILY MEMBER. CHARGE USD 75.00 FOR NO-SHOW. WAIVED FOR DEATH OF PASSENGER OR FAMILY MEMBER. NOTE - CHILD DISCOUNT DOES NOT APPLY INFANT NOT OCCUPYING A SEAT FREE OF CHARGE ----- MOST RESTRICTIVE CONDITIONS APPLY WITHIN A PRICING UNIT WITH FOLLOWING EXCEPTION WHEN COMBINING A REFUNDABLE FARE WITH A NON- REFUNDABLE FARE 1. THE AMOUNT PAID ON THE REFUNDABLE FARE COMPONENT IS REFUNDED MINUS ANY APPLICABLE PENALTY 2. THE AMOUNT PAID ON THE NON-REFUNDABLE FARE COMPONENT WILL NOT BE REFUNDED BOTH NONREFUNDABLE AMOUNT AND PENALTY SHALL BE ADDED AS REFUND FEES. ----- IN CASE OF REFUND MADE WITHIN 24HOURS BEFORE FLIGHT OR AFTER FLIGHT DEPARTURE REFUND OR NOSHOW CHARGE WILL BE APPLIED WHICHEVER IS HIGHER. ----- FUEL- INSURANCE SURCHARGES ARE REFUNDABLE. SERVICE CHARGE IS NON-REFUNDABLE. ----- REFUND OF UNUSED FEES AND TAXES PERMITTED. UNLESS APPLICABLE OW/RT FARE PLUS TAXES FOR ACTUAL TRAVEL IS HIGHER THAN WHOLE ORIGINAL TICKET. IN THIS CASE NO TAX OR FEE REFUND WILL BE PERMITTED. IN CASE OF NONREFUNDABLE FARES AFTER DEPARTURE NO TAX REFUND. ----- THE NONREFUNDABLE AMOUNT REMAINS NONREFUNDABLE EVEN IF UPGRADED TO A HIGHER FARE. IN THIS CASE REFUND PENALTY WILL EQUAL NONREFUNDABLE AMOUNT PLUS REFUND PENALTY OF THE HIGHER FARE. ----- IN CASE OF TICKET ISSUED USING INCORRECT RBD A CHARGE OF EGP500 WILL BE CHARGED PLUS FARE DIFFERENCE IF ANY ----- TICKET COUPONS MUST BE USED IN SEQUENCE. ANY UNUSED COUPON PRECEDING A USED COUPON CANNOT BE USED/ REISSUED AND MAY ONLY BE REFUNDED. ----- FULL REFUND PERMITTED BEFORE DEPARTURE IN CASE OF REJECTION OF VISA. EMBASSY STATEMENT REQUIRED. EXCEPTION NOT APPLICABLE FOR GROUPS OR HAJJ AND UMRA PASSENGERS. ----- 
CHANGES 
ANY TIME CHARGE USD 30.00 FOR REISSUE/REVALIDATION. WAIVED FOR DEATH OF PASSENGER OR FAMILY MEMBER. NOTE - CHILD DISCOUNT DOES NOT APPLY INFANT NOT OCCUPYING A SEAT FREE OF CHARGE ----- IN CASE OF REISSUE/ REVALIDATION 24HOURS BEFORE FLIGHT OR AFTER FLIGHT DEPARTURE ONLY NOSHOW FEES TO BE APPLIED. ----- UPGRADE TO HIGHER COMPARTMENT ON SAME FLIGHT/SAME DATE IS PERMITTED WITHOUT A CHARGE ONLY FARE DIFFERENCE TO BE COLLECTED. ----- REISSUE MUST BE COMPLETED 24 HOURS BEFORE FLIGHT DEPARTURE OR WILL BE CHARGED AS NOSHOW. ----- FEE APPLIED PER CHANGED FARE COMPONANT. IF MULTIPLE CHANGES ARE MADE AT THE SAME TIME HIGHEST FEE WILL BE APPLIED OF ALL  CHANGED FARE COMPONANTS. ----- REISSUE RESULTING FARE MUST BE EQUAL OR HIGHER THAN PREVIOUS BASIC FARE. EXCEPTION FROM BUSINESS CLASS TO Y RBD FARES IS PERMITTED. ----- IN CASE OF REISSUE OF UNUSED TICKET APPLY CURRENT FARES. EXCEPTION FOR CHANGE OF ONLY INBOUND FARE COMPONENT APPLY HISTORICAL FARE. BOTH CHANGE FEES AND DIFFERENCE IN FARE TO BE COLLECTED. ----- IN CASE OF REISSUE OF PARTIAL USED TICKETS APPLY HISTORICAL FARES RECALCULATED FROM THE LAST FARE BREAK POINT. ALL CONDITIONS OF THE NEW FARES MUST BE COMPLIED WITH BOTH CHANGE FEES AND DIFFERENCE IN FARE TO BE COLLECTED. ----- INVOLUNTARY CHANGES TO BE EXECUTED FROM EGYPTAIR SALES OFFICES OR CALL CENTER ONLY. TRAVEL AGENTS ARE NOT ALLOWED TO ISSUE INVOLUNTARY TICKETS.

rules_general_info:
RU.RULE APPLICATION BETWEEN MIDDLE EAST AND EGYPT MS ONE WAY INSTANT PURCHASE FARES FROM MIDDLE EAST TO EGYPT APPLICATION AREA THESE FARES APPLY FROM MIDDLE EAST TO EGYPT. CLASS OF SERVICE THESE FARES APPLY FOR ECONOMY CLASS SERVICE. TYPES OF TRANSPORTATION FARES GOVERNED BY THIS RULE CAN BE USED TO CREATE ONE-WAY JOURNEYS. FARES ONLY APPLY IF PURCHASED BEFORE DEPARTURE. EXCEPTION-CAN BE USED FOR EN-ROUTE UP-GRADING FROM LOWER FARE. CAPACITY LIMITATIONS THE CARRIER SHALL LIMIT THE NUMBER OF PASSENGERS CARRIED ON ANY ONE FLIGHT AT FARES GOVERNED BY THIS RULE AND SUCH FARES WILL NOT NECESSARILY BE AVAILABLE ON ALL FLIGHTS. THE NUMBER OF SEATS WHICH THE CARRIER SHALL MAKE AVAILABLE ON A GIVEN FLIGHT WILL BE DETERMINED BY THE CARRIERS BEST JUDGMENT OTHER CONDITIONS PASSENGER EXPENSES NOT PERMITTED. IN THIS CASE REFUND PENALTY WILL EQUAL NONREFUNDABLE AMOUNT PLUS REFUND PENALTY OF THE HIGHER FARE. ----- IN CASE OF TICKET ISSUED USING INCORRECT RBD A CHARGE OF EGP500 WILL BE CHARGED PLUS FARE DIFFERENCE IF ANY ----- TICKET COUPONS MUST BE USED IN SEQUENCE. ANY UNUSED COUPON PRECEDING A USED COUPON CANNOT BE USED/ REISSUED AND MAY ONLY BE REFUNDED. ----- FULL REFUND PERMITTED BEFORE DEPARTURE IN CASE OF REJECTION OF VISA. EMBASSY STATEMENT REQUIRED. EXCEPTION NOT APPLICABLE FOR GROUPS OR HAJJ AND UMRA PASSENGERS. ----- 
CHANGES 
ANY TIME CHARGE USD 30.00 FOR REISSUE/REVALIDATION. WAIVED FOR DEATH OF PASSENGER OR FAMILY MEMBER. NOTE - CHILD DISCOUNT DOES NOT APPLY INFANT NOT OCCUPYING A SEAT FREE OF CHARGE ----- IN CASE OF REISSUE/ REVALIDATION 24HOURS BEFORE FLIGHT OR AFTER FLIGHT DEPARTURE ONLY NOSHOW FEES TO BE APPLIED. ----- UPGRADE TO HIGHER COMPARTMENT ON SAME FLIGHT/SAME DATE IS PERMITTED WITHOUT A CHARGE ONLY FARE DIFFERENCE TO BE COLLECTED. ----- REISSUE MUST BE COMPLETED 24 HOURS BEFORE FLIGHT DEPARTURE OR WILL BE CHARGED AS NOSHOW. ----- FEE APPLIED PER CHANGED FARE COMPONANT. IF MULTIPLE CHANGES ARE MADE AT THE SAME TIME HIGHEST FEE WILL BE APPLIED OF ALL  CHANGED FARE COMPONANTS. ----- REISSUE RESULTING FARE MUST BE EQUAL OR HIGHER THAN PREVIOUS BASIC FARE. EXCEPTION FROM BUSINESS CLASS TO Y RBD FARES IS PERMITTED. ----- IN CASE OF REISSUE OF UNUSED TICKET APPLY CURRENT FARES. EXCEPTION FOR CHANGE OF ONLY INBOUND FARE COMPONENT APPLY HISTORICAL FARE. BOTH CHANGE FEES AND DIFFERENCE IN FARE TO BE COLLECTED. ----- IN CASE OF REISSUE OF PARTIAL USED TICKETS APPLY HISTORICAL FARES RECALCULATED FROM THE LAST FARE BREAK POINT. ALL CONDITIONS OF THE NEW FARES MUST BE COMPLIED WITH BOTH CHANGE FEES AND DIFFERENCE IN FARE TO BE COLLECTED. ----- INVOLUNTARY CHANGES TO BE EXECUTED FROM EGYPTAIR SALES OFFICES OR CALL CENTER ONLY. TRAVEL AGENTS ARE NOT ALLOWED TO ISSUE INVOLUNTARY TICKETS.
